S06psp_6-8u:164: skandhadhatvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā pāramitā vā śūnyatā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:165_1: vā sarvākārajñatā vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:165_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā anupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣā prajñāyate 'nupūrvapratipat prajñāyate,

S06psp_6-8u:167: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:168: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tan nāsti rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:169_0: nāsti vijñānaṃ nāsti skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā nāsti pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni
S06psp_6-8u:169_4: buddho nāsti dharmo nāsti saṃgho nāsti mārgo nāsti phalaṃ nāsti saṃkleśo nāsti vyavadānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:169_5: nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayo yāvan nāsti sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:170: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:171: api nu subhūte 'bhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣv astitā vā nāstitā vopalabhate.

S06psp_6-8u:173: bhagavān āha: tat katham idaṃ subhūte evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:174: yady abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tan nāsti rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:178: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:179: nāhaṃ bhagavann atra dharmeṣu kāṅkṣāmi na vicikitsāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:180: api tu khalu bhagavan bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakayānikāś ca pratyekabuddhayānikāś ca bodhisattvayānikāś ca ta evaṃ vakṣyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:181: abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ ko 'tra saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ te jānantaḥ śīlavipannāś ca bhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭivipannāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:182: ācāravipannāś ca teṣāṃ śīlavipannānāṃ dṛṣṭivipannānām ācāravipannānāṃ trayāṇām gatīnām anyatarā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06psp_6-8u:183: narakagatir vā tiryagyonigatir vā yamalokagatir vā,

S06psp_6-8u:184_1: etad arthaṃ prcchāmi. api tu khalu punar bhagavann aham eteṣu dharmeṣu na kāṅkṣāmi na vicikitsāmi.
S06psp_6-8u:185: bhagavān āha: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etad yathā vadasy evam etat.
S06psp_6-8u:186: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:187: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamānā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānām arthāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:189: yata eva subhūte 'bhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tata eva bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:190: tathā hi duḥkhākṣayaś ca subhūte upalaṃbho nopalaṃbhasaṃjñinaḥ prāptir nābhisamayo nānuttarā ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.

S06psp_6-8u:192: bhagavān āha: anupalaṃbha eva subhūte prāptir anupalaṃbha evābhisamayaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:194: dharmadhātor avikopitatām upādāya dharmadhātuṃ sa icched vikopayituṃ yo 'nupalaṃbhaprāptiṃ (PSP_6-8:13)
S06psp_6-8u:196: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann anupalaṃbhasya na prāptir nābhisamayo nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:197: anupalaṃbha eva prāptir anupalaṃbha evābhisamayo 'nupalaṃbha evānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:198: tat kutaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamā bhūmiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:199: kuto dvitīyā kutas tṛtīyā yāvat kuto daśamī bhūmiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:207: kuto vipākajā prajñā yatra vipāke sthitvā vipākajair dharmaiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,

S06psp_6-8u:210_1: śayanāsanopāśrayeṇa pradīpenānyatarānyatarābhir vā mānuṣyakībhiḥ saṃpattibhis tāś
S06psp_6-8u:210_2: cāsya nocchedyante yāvat parinirvṛtasya śarīre śrāvakeṣu ca vipacyate tac ca na kṣīyate.
S06psp_6-8u:211: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:212_0: yata eva subhūte 'nupalaṃbhas tata eva prathamā bhūmir dvitīyā bhūmis tṛtīyā bhūmir
S06psp_6-8u:212_1: yāvad daśamī bhūmis tasyaiva vipākajāḥ pañcābhijñās tataś caivaiṃ vipākajaṃ dānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:212_2: śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā ca tataś caiva kuśalamūlāni vipākajāni yaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:212_3: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti buddhakṣetrañ ca parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:213_1: prādīpenānyatarānyatarābhir vā mānuṣyopakaraṇasaṃpattibhis tāś cāsya nopacchidyante,

S06psp_6-8u:221: kathaṃ punar bhagavann anupaliptānāṃ dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñānām abhijñānāñ ca na kiñcin nānākaraṇaṃ nirdiśyate?

S06psp_6-8u:238_1: mahāsattvo 'nupalaṃbhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:242: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyām anupūrvābhisamayādhikāro
S06psp_6-8u:246: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:247: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ekacittena ṣaṭprajñāḥ parigṛhṇāti,

S06psp_6-8u:248_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny
S06psp_6-8u:248_2: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgān trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ

S06psp_6-8u:263: yān daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikān buddhadharmān yāṃ mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:266: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:267: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattva ekacittena ṣaṭpāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_6-8u:271: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīto yad dānaṃ dadāti tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:276: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:284: kathaṃ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:285: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:292: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:293: sa tatra dānapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭpāramitā antargatāḥ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:294_0: yāvat sarvabodhipakṣyān dharmān antargatāṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte
S06psp_6-8u:294_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sa tatrānāsrave
S06psp_6-8u:294_2: citte sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti sa tatrānāsrave citte sthito nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. kasmai vā dadāmi?

S06psp_6-8u:306: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena kṣāntyā saṃpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:310: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena vīryam ārabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:314: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:318: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:319: sa tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayan na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:322_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena
S06psp_6-8u:326: sa tān dharmān na samanupaśyati, tac (PSP_6-8:18)
S06psp_6-8u:327: cittaṃ na samanupaśyati, yāvat sarvabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:328: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann animittān abhisaṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dānapāramitāparipūritā bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:330: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya paripūrir bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:333: pañcānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:334: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:335: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:336_1: yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkārān ādhyātmikāṃ bāhyāṃ vā bhāryāputraduhitṛrājyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:336_2: vālaṃkṛtya dānaṃ dadāti yācanakānān tasya kaścid evāgatyaivaṃ vadet:
S06psp_6-8u:337: kin te 'nena īdṛśena dānena dattenaivaṃ nirūpakāreṇa tasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:339: kin te 'nena vā dānena vā dattenaivam āsphārikena dattenārthasya ca dātavyam evaṃ mayā dānaṃ,

S06psp_6-8u:362: yathā caiva vipākañ ca na parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:363: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ manasaiva sarvopakaraṇāni bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:364: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya manasaiva sarvopakaraṇaṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:365: sa tena dānena buddhāṃś ca bhagavata upatiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:366_0: sadevamānuṣāsurañ ca lokaṃ saṃtarpayati sa tān sattvāṃs tayā dānapāramitayā parigṛhyopāyakauśalyena
S06psp_6-8u:366_1: triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:367: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:369: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tac chīlam āryam anāsravaṃ mārgaparyāpannaṃ dharmatāprātilaṃbhikaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:371: sa cāsya śīlaskandho 'khaṇḍo bhavaty acchidro 'śavalo 'kalmāṣo 'parāmṛṣṭo 'bhujiṣyaḥ susamātto vijñapraśastaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:372: tena ca śīlena kaṃcid dharmaṃ na parāmṛśati,
S06psp_6-8u:373: rūpaṃ vā vedanāṃ vā saṃjñāṃ vā saṃskārāṃ vā vijñānaṃ vā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni (PSP_6-8:20)
S06psp_6-8u:374_0: vāśītyanuvyañjanāni vā kṣatriyamahāśālakulaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakulaṃ vā gṛhapatimahāśālakulaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:374_1: vā cāturmahārājakāyikān vā devāṃs trayastriṃśān vā yāmān vā tuṣitān vā nirmāṇaratīn
S06psp_6-8u:374_2: vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmapāriṣadyān vā brahmapurohitān vā mahābrahmāṇo
S06psp_6-8u:374_3: vā parīttābhān vā apramāṇābhān vā ābhāsvarābhān vā parīttaśubhān vā apramāṇaśubhān
S06psp_6-8u:374_4: vā śubhakṛtsṇān vā anabhrakān vā puṇyaprasavān vā bṛhatphalān vā asaṃjñisattvān vā
S06psp_6-8u:374_5: śuddhāvāsān vā aspṛhān vā atapān vā sudṛśān vā sudarśanān vā akaniṣṭhān vā ākāśānantyāyatanān
S06psp_6-8u:374_6: vā vijñānānantyāyatanān vā ākiñcanyāyatanān vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanān vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:374_7: vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā cakravartirājyādhipatyaṃ vā na parāmṛśati,
S06psp_6-8u:375: anyatra sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:378: tayā ca śīlapāramitayā paripūrṇayopāyakauśalyena catvāri dhyānāny utpādayaty anāsvādayogena divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:379: yena divyacakṣuṣā vipākajena ye pūrvasyān diśi lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:380: tān paśyati tac cāsya darśanaṃ ca na naśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:382: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyān diśy uttarasyān diśy ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:383: tān paśyati tasya darśanaṃ na naśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:384: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. sa divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:385: tac cāsya śrutaṃ tāvan na naśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:386: yāvan na tena śrutenātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:387: sa cetaḥparyāyajñānena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajānāti tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti, sa (PSP_6-8:21)
S06psp_6-8u:388: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānenātītaṃ karma nirdiśati yena karmaṇākṛtena tat karma na vipraṇasyati,
S06psp_6-8u:396_0: evaṃ yatra yatra pratibalāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tatra tatra pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:396_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena
S06psp_6-8u:398: katham animittānām anābhogānām anupalaṃbhamānānām apratibhānām anabhisaṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:400_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍe
S06psp_6-8u:400_1: niṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā āgatya loṣṭadaṇḍaprahārān dahyus tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaikacittasyāpi
S06psp_6-8u:400_2: kṣobhasahagatasyāvakāśo na dātavyas tatra ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dve kṣāntī
S06psp_6-8u:400_3: bhāvayitavye. katame dve yac ca sarvasattvānāṃ kṣāntavyam ākrośadaṇḍaloṣṭaprahārādiyā
S06psp_6-8u:400_4: cāsyānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir utpādayitavyā tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākruśyamānena
S06psp_6-8u:400_5: paribhāṣyamāṇena loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān dadatām evaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ ko me ākrośati
S06psp_6-8u:400_6: vā paribhāṣate vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastrair vā prahārān dadāti tena dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:400_7: pratyavekṣitavyo dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmāṃś caiva nopalabhate kutaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:400_8: punar dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam. tasyaivaṃ dharmasvabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:401: ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā sa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmāṇāṃ dharmasvabhāvam anutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:402: tatrānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ kim iti kleśānutpattijñānānācchedyatā ca sa iha dvābhyāṃ kṣāntibhyāṃ yuktaś catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:403: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni caturarddhipādāni pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni (PSP_6-8:22)
S06psp_6-8u:404: āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:405_0: sa iha dharmeṣu sthitvāryeṣv anāsraveṣu lokottareṣu sādhāraṇeṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair
S06psp_6-8u:405_1: abhijñāḥ paripūrayati yābhir abhijñābhiḥ paripūritābhiḥ ṣaḍbhiś ca pāramitābhiḥ samudāgacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:406: sa ihābhijñāsu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi yān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati tān dṛṣṭvā buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:407: tasya sā buddhānusmṛtir nocchetsyati yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:408: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu yān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati tān dṛṣṭvā buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:411_0: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa yat te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣiṣyante
S06psp_6-8u:411_1: tat sarvam udgrahīṣyaty udgṛhṇaṃ tathatvāya sattvānāṃ dharman deśayiṣyati teṣāṃ ca
S06psp_6-8u:411_2: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāsyaty evaṃ sarvāryāṇāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:411_3: yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:412: sa tena cetaḥ paryāyajñānena sattvānāṃ cetasaiva caittam ājñāya tathatvāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:413: sa pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlam ājñāya tena pūrveṇa kuśalamūlena sattvān saṃdarśayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati samādāpayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:414: sa āsravakṣayajñānena ca tān sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu niveśayiṣyati pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:415_0: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvāṃś
S06psp_6-8u:415_1: ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:415_2: paripūrayaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:415_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:416: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_6-8:23)
S06psp_6-8u:417: carann ānimitteṣv anāsraveṣv anābhogeṣv anupalaṃbheṣv apratibhāseṣu vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:419: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:420: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:422: yāvac candrasūryau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārṣṭi sa tena kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato yena daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:423_0: anekaśatasahasreṣu lokadhātuṣv ṛddhyā gatvā tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhati cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārais
S06psp_6-8u:423_1: tasya te cīvarapiṇḍapātrās tāvan na kṣīyante yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate
S06psp_6-8u:424: cīvarapiṇḍapātreṇa parinirvṛtasya ca śarīre pūjā pravartate,
S06psp_6-8u:425: tenaiva carddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa gatvā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:428: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:429_0: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayaty anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_6-8u:429_1: abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:429_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:429_3: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgata āryeṇānāsraveṇa
S06psp_6-8u:429_4: mārgāṅgena mārgaparyāpannena vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayatīha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:429_5: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato 'kuśalasya kāyikakarmaṇo
S06psp_6-8u:429_6: 'vakāśaṃ na dadāty akuśalasya vākkarmaṇo 'kuśalasya manaskarmaṇo 'vakāśaṃ na dadāti
S06psp_6-8u:429_7: na parāmṛśati nityam iti vā anityam iti vā sukham iti vā duḥkham iti vātmeti vānātmeti
S06psp_6-8u:429_8: vā saṃskṛtam iti vāsaṃskṛtam iti vā kāmadhātum iti vā rūpadhātum iti vārūpyadhātuṃ
S06psp_6-8u:430: prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ caturthaṃ vā dhyānaṃ maitrīṃ vā karuṇāṃ vā muditāṃ vopekṣāṃ vākāśānantyāyatanaṃ (PSP_6-8:24)
S06psp_6-8u:431: va vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ vākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:432: smṛtyupasthānāni vā samyakprahāṇāni varddhipādāṃ vā indriyāṇi vā balāni vā bodhyaṅgāni vāryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ vā mārgaṃ śūnyatāṃ vānimittaṃ vāpraṇihitaṃ vāryasatyāni vābhijñā vā vimokṣān
S06psp_6-8u:433_0: vā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr vā samādhīn vā dhāraṇīmukhāni vā tathāgatabalāni vā
S06psp_6-8u:433_1: vaiśāradyāni vā pratisaṃvido vāveṇikān vā buddhadharmān na parāmṛśati nityānityasukhaduḥkhātmānātmaśāntāśānta iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:434_0: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekāṃ vā bodhim
S06psp_6-8u:434_1: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ srotaāpannaṃ vā sakṛdāgāminaṃ vānāgāminaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:434_2: pratyekabuddhaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ vā buddhaṃ vā bhagavantaṃ na parāmṛśatīme sattvā
S06psp_6-8u:436: ime ūrddhabhāgikaprabhāvitā ime sarvajñatāprabhāvitā ime mārgajñatāprabhāvitā ime sarvākārajñatāprabhāvitā ity evam api na parāmṛśati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:437: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:439: sa tena caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato maraṇasukhe 'pi vartamānaḥ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:445: sa tena kāyikena caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgatas tān kuśalān dharmān parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:448: lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmati sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:449: sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan yena yenarddhiprātihāryeṇecchati vikurvituṃ tena tenarddhiprātihāryeṇa vikurvati,
S06psp_6-8u:450_0: yadi vā puṣpavarṣeṇa yadi vā gandhapramuñcanena yadi vā gītābharaṇena yadi vā bhūcalanena
S06psp_6-8u:450_1: yadi vā saptaratnamayair lokadhātusaṃdarśanena yadi vā jyotiratnānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśa
S06psp_6-8u:450_2: ātmānam avasṛjati yadi vā gandham avasṛjati yadi vā mahāyajñam avasṛjati,
S06psp_6-8u:455: adattādānāt kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādāt piśunavacanāt paruṣavacanād avaddhapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādāt mithyādṛṣṭeḥ parimocayati,
S06psp_6-8u:460: evaṃ yena yenopāyena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:462: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:464: kathañ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:466: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sthāpayitvā tathāgatasamādhiṃ sarvasamādhīn paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:467_0: sa viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sa vitarkaṃ sa vicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:467_1: prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:468: maitrīsahagatena cittena karuṇāsahagatena muditāsahagatenopekṣāsahagatena cittena yāvat sarvāvantam lokadhātum upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:469: ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:470: sa tatra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvāṣṭavimokṣān anulomapratilomān upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:476: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vajropamaṃ ca samādhim upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:480_0: kṛtvā śuklavidarśanā bhūmim atikramya gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ tanubhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ
S06psp_6-8u:480_1: vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvibhūmiṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:485: so 'tra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:486: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsamānaḥ sa tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike kuśalamūlam avaropayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:489: sattvān dānena saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścic chīlena saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścit kṣāntyā saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścid vīryeṇa saṃgṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:492: kāṃścid vimuktyā kāṃścid vimuktijñānadarśanena kāṃścit srotāapattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:493: kāṃścit sakṛdāgāmiphale kāṃścid anāgāmiphale kāṃścid arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:494: kāṃścit pratyekabodhau kāṃścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:495: yair yaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ sattvā udgacchanti tatra tān sattvān niyojayati sa iha dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasamādhimukhāny abhinirharati catasraś ca pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:496: pratilabhate vipākajānāñ cābhijñānām lābhī bhavati sa na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:497: na jātu kāmān pratisevate na sā kācid upapattir yāṃ na gṛhṇāti na cotpattir doṣair lipyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:498: tathā hi tena māyopamā sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ supratibuddhā bhavanti sa māyopamaṃ sarvasaṃskāragataṃ viditvā mahākaruṇā pratigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:499: na ca tatra sattvān sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:500_0: sa sattvān sattvaprajñaptim anupalaṃbhamānaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anupalaṃbha eva sattvān
S06psp_6-8u:500_1: pratiṣṭhāpayati lokavyavahāram upādāya na ca punaḥ paramārthena iha dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:500_2: sthitvā sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṣu carati na jātu dhyānapāramitayā virahito bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:502: sa iha sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatām abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:505_0: sa ātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ kurvan sadevamānuṣāsuralokasya dakṣiṇīyo bhavāti. evaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:505_1: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:506: iti dānādīnām anyatamena sarvānāsravaikalakṣaṇasaṃgrahalakṣaṇo 'yam ekacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ prathamaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:508: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāpripūrim gacchati?
S06psp_6-8u:510: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcid dharmaṃ sadbhūtaṃ vā pariniṣpannaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:512: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāsadbhūtatām apariniṣpannatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:514: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:515: sa rūpasyotpādam asamanupaśyan vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ na samanupaśyan rūpasyāyadvāraṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:517: evaṃ yāvat sarvasāsravānāṃ dharmāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āyadvāraṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:519: evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpasya svabhāvan nopalabhate yāvat sarvasāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvan nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:520: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmān adhimucate,
S06psp_6-8u:521: sa evam adhimucyādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran na keṣu kācid dharmeṣv abhiniviśate,
S06psp_6-8u:522_0: rūpe vā vedanāyāṃ vā saṃjñāyāṃ vā saṃskāreṣu vā vijñāne vā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:522_1: vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu vā pāramitāsu vā śūnyatāsu vā bodhipakṣyeṣu vā dharmeṣv
S06psp_6-8u:525_0: yad uta ṣaṭpāramitā yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmān
S06psp_6-8u:525_1: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny aśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:526_0: sa vipākajadharme bodhisattvamārge sthitvā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu paripūrṇāsu yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:526_1: dharmeṣu paripūrṇesu yāvad vipākajāsu pañcasv abhijñāsu sthitvā ye sattvā dānenānugrahītavyās
S06psp_6-8u:527: ye śīlena ye samādhinā ye prajñayā ye vimuktyā ye vimuktijñānadarśanenānugrahītavyās tāṃs tair anugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:528_0: ye srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā ye sakṛdāgāmiphale ye 'nāgāmiphale ye 'rhattve
S06psp_6-8u:528_1: ye pratyekabodhau ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tān anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:529: evaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ so 'nekavidhām ṛddhiṃ kurvāṇo gaṅgānadīvālukopamām lokadhātūn na gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:530: sa ākāṅkṣaṃs tāṃ lokadhātūn yādṛśai ratnair
S06psp_6-8u:531: ākāṃkṣati tādṛśai ratnair abhinirmiṇoti sa sattvābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayaṃ lokadhātūn saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:532: sa tāṃ lokadhātūn dṛṣṭvā buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:534: ye 'py anye lokadhātavo 'pagatapāpiṣṭhā evaṃ vidhās tenopabhogaparibhogāḥ syur iti,
S06psp_6-8u:535_0: sa tayā vipākajayā dānapāramitayā śīlapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā vīryapāramitayā
S06psp_6-8u:535_1: dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā vipākajābhir abhijñābhir vipākajena bodhisattvamārgeṇa
S06psp_6-8u:535_2: mārgajñatāyāṃ caran sarvapāramitāḥ prāptaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:536: yāvat sarvañ caiva rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apagṛhītaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:537: yāvat sarvadharmāḥ kuśalā vākuśalā vā laukikā vā lokottarā vā sāsravā vānāsravā vā saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā sāvadyā vānavadyā vā (PSP_6-8:29)
S06psp_6-8u:539: tasmāt tarhi subhūte tasyānuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre 'parigṛhītaḥ sarvopabhogo bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:540: tathā hi sarvadharmā aparigṛhltā anupalaṃbhayogena. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimittayogena prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:542: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:543: kathaṃ bhagavann evam asaṃbhinneṣu dharmeṣv ānimitteṣu lakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu ṣaṭpāramitābhāvanāparipūrir bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:544: dānapāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ katham eṣāṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:547: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyām antargatā bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:548: kathaṃ bhagavann evam alakṣaṇeṣu dharmeṣv ekalakṣaṇeṣu yad utālakṣaṇeṣu nānākaraṇaṃ prabhāvyate.
S06psp_6-8u:549: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:550_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu
S06psp_6-8u:550_1: pratiśrutkopameṣu pratibhāsopameṣu pratibiṃbhopameṣu marīcyupameṣu māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:550_2: gandharvanagaropameṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:550_3: rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānāni samāpadyate prajñāṃ bhāvayati
S06psp_6-8u:550_4: svapnopamāṃś ca pañcaskandhān alakṣaṇān jānāti pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān
S06psp_6-8u:550_5: marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca pañcaskandhān alakṣaṇān
S06psp_6-8u:551: na hi svapnaṃ tasya kaścit svabhāvo na hi pratiśrutkāyā na hi pratibhāsasya na hi pratibiṃbasya na hi marīcyā na hi māyāyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:552: na hi nirmitakasya na hi gandharvanagarasya kaścit svabhāvo (PSP_6-8:30)
S06psp_6-8u:553: yasya svabhāvo nāsti tasya nāsti lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:554: yasya ca nāsti lakṣaṇaṃ sa ekalakṣaṇo yad utālakṣaṇaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:555: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam alakṣaṇaṃ dānam alakṣaṇo dāyako 'lakṣaṇaḥ pratigrāhako 'lakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. evaṃ jñātvā dānaṃ dadāti sa dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:556: sa dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayan śīlapāramitāyāṃ na vivartate,
S06psp_6-8u:561: sa āsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayati catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:571_0: iha vipākajeṣv āryeṣv anāsraveṣu sthitvā daśasu dikṣu ye lokadhātavas tān ṛddhyā
S06psp_6-8u:571_1: gatvā buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste tāṃś copatiṣṭhati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyasarvopakaraṇapariṣkārair
S06psp_6-8u:572_0: ye dānena saṃgrahītavyās tān dānena saṃgṛhṇāti ye śīleṇa saṃgrahītavyā ye kṣāntyā
S06psp_6-8u:572_1: saṃgrahītavyā ye vīryeṇa saṃgrahītavyā ye dhyānena saṃgrahītavyā ye prajñayā saṃgrahītavyās
S06psp_6-8u:573_0: yāvad ye sarvaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃgrahītavyās tān sarvān kuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti
S06psp_6-8u:573_1: kuśalair dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃsāraṃ copādadāti na ca saṃsārāvacarair duṣkhair
S06psp_6-8u:573_2: lipyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo devamānuṣikīñ ca saṃpattim utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:575: so 'lakṣaṇān sarvasattvāṃ jñātvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:576: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra (PSP_6-8:31)
S06psp_6-8u:578: anāgāmiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:579: arhattvañ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:580: pratyekabodhiṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:581_0: tathā hi tena sarvākārajñatānuprāptavyā yo 'sādhāraṇā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:581_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇān sarvadharmān jñātvā ṣaṭpāramitā alakṣaṇā jānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:583_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:583_2: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:584_0: sa khalu punaḥ svapnopamān pañcopādānaskandhān jñātvā pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān
S06psp_6-8u:584_1: pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca pañcopādānaskandhān
S06psp_6-8u:585_0: akhaṇḍām acchidrām aśabalām akalmāṣām aparāmṛṣṭām abhujiṣyāṃ vijñapraśastāṃ susamāttām
S06psp_6-8u:585_1: āryām anāsravāṃ mārgāṅgaparyāpannāṃ yatra sthitvā samatābhisaṃskārikaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣati
S06psp_6-8u:585_2: dharmatāpratilaṃbhikaṃ ca vijñaptiśīlaṃ ca samudācāraśīlaṃ ca so 'nenaivaṃrūpeṇa
S06psp_6-8u:586_1: vā sahavratāyopapadyeyāhaṃ rājā vā bhaveyaṃ cakravartī koṭṭarājā vā cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:586_2: vā devānāṃ sahavratāyopapadyeyāhaṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ vā yāmānāṃ vā tuṣitānāṃ vā nirmānaratīnāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:586_3: vā paranirmitavaśavartināṃ vā devānāṃ sahavratāyopapadyeyāhaṃ brahmapārṣadyānāṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:586_4: brahmaprohitānāṃ vā mahābrahmāṇāṃ vā parīttābhānāṃ vāpramāṇābhānāṃ vābhāsvarāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:586_5: vā parīttaśubhānāṃ vāpramāṇaśubhānāṃ vā śubhakṛtsnānāṃ vānabhrakānāṃ vā puṇyaprasavānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:586_6: vā bṛhatphalānāṃ vāsaṃjñisattvānāṃ vā śuddhāvāsānāṃ vā (PSP_6-8:32)
S06psp_6-8u:587_0: aspṛhāṇāṃ vā aptapānāṃ vā sudṛśānāṃ vā sudarśanānāṃ vā akaniṣṭhānāṃ vā devānāṃ sahavratāyopapadyeyāham
S06psp_6-8u:587_1: ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ vā vijñānānantyāyatanānāṃ vākiñcanyāyatanānāṃ vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:587_2: vā sahavratyāyopapadyeyāhaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vānuprāpnuyāṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:587_3: vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vānuprāpnuyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:588: tathā hi subhūte 'lakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā ekalakṣaṇāṃ yad utābhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:589: na hy alakṣaṇo dharmo 'lakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:590: nāpi vilakṣaṇo dharmo vilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:591: nāpy avilakṣaṇo dharmo 'vilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ prāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann alakṣaṇāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:592_0: śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrānto
S06psp_6-8u:592_1: 'nutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate 'nutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhya
S06psp_6-8u:593: pañcasu dhāraṇīmukhaśateṣu sthitvā catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:594: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṇa budhhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:595: sa pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃsarati na ca saṃsārāvacareṇa karmaṇā vipākajena lipyate,
S06psp_6-8u:596: tadyathāpi nāma nirmitaś caṃkramati ca tiṣṭhati ca niṣīdati ca śayyāṃ ca parikalpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:598: na gamanaṃ na sthānaṃ na niṣadyāṃ na śayyāṃ nāsanaṃ na caṃkramaḥ sa sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:599: na ca sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:600: tadyathāpi nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati,
S06psp_6-8u:601: aparimāṇān sattvān vinīya tribhir yānair na kaścit sattvam upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:602_0: yam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākuryāt sa āyuḥ saṃskārān avasṛjya nirmitam abhinirmāyānupadhiśeṣe
S06psp_6-8u:602_1: nirvāṇadhātau pariniryāyāt. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte nirmitaḥ kalpasyātyayena bodhisattvaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:602_2: mahāsattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvṛtas tasya ca parinirvṛtasya
S06psp_6-8u:604: rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:605: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:607_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:607_2: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:609: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:611: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś catasṛbhiḥ kṣāntibhiḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:613_0: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasyātrāntare sarvasattvā ākrośeyur vā paribhāṣeran vāsatyayā
S06psp_6-8u:613_1: vācā paruṣayā vā samudācareyur loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadyus tatra bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:614: ko me ākrośati vā paribhāṣate vāsatyayā vācā paruṣayā vā samudācarati loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadāti, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:616: sarvadharmāḥ kṣamanti tat kiṃ asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:617: ko me ākrośati vā paribhāṣate vāsatyayā vācā paruṣayā vā samudācarati loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadāti sa evam upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:618: so 'nayā kṣāntipāramitayā paripūrṇayānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate.
S06psp_6-8u:619: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:620: kaiṣā bhagavann anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ kiṃ vā etasyāḥ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ vā jñānam?
S06psp_6-8u:621: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:622: aṇavo 'pi subhūte 'kuśalā dharmā notpadyante tenocyante 'nutpattikā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:623: tatra yā kṣāntis tad ucyate jñānaṃ yena jñānenānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ (PSP_6-8:34) pratilabdhate.
S06psp_6-8u:624: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:625: yā ca bhagavan śrāvakānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ vānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir yā ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir āsāṃ kṣāntīnāṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:627: yac ca subhūte srotaāpannasya jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:628: yac ca sakṛdāgāmino jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:629: yac cānāgāmināṃ jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:630: yac cārhato jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:631: yac ca pratyekabuddhasya jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ. idaṃ subhūte nānākaraṇaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kṣānter bodhisattvakṣānteś ca,
S06psp_6-8u:632_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ihaivaṃ rūpayā kṣāntyā samanvāgataḥ
S06psp_6-8u:632_1: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhān abhibhavati vipākajāyām anutpattikāyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_6-8u:633: yayā paripūrṇayāvirahito bhavati saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaiś ca samādhibhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:634: sa iha pañcabhir abhijñābhir avirahito bhavati so 'virahitatvād ābhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:635: sattvāṃś ca paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:636_0: punar aparaṃ subhūtr bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:636_2: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:638: kathañ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:640: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyikaṃ ca caitasikaṃ ca vīryam ārabhate sa kāyikena vīryeṇa ṛddhim abhinirharati, (PSP_6-8:35)
S06psp_6-8u:641: daśadiglokadhātuṃ gatvā buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:642_0: sa tena kāyikena vīryeṇa sattvān pāripācayati triṣu yāneṣu niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati
S06psp_6-8u:642_1: śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne 'nuttare buddhayāne. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:642_2: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann alakṣaṇāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:643: sa caitasikena vīryeṇānāsraveṇa mārgaparyāpannena vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:644_0: yatra paryāpannāḥ sarvakuśalā dharmās tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
S06psp_6-8u:644_1: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañcabalāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ trīṇi
S06psp_6-8u:644_2: vimokṣamukhāni catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭavimokṣā
S06psp_6-8u:644_3: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś catvāri satyāni pañcābhijñāḥ samādhiḥ dhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_6-8u:644_4: daśa bodhisattvabhūmayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_6-8u:645_0: yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sarvākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā yasyāṃ paripūrṇāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:645_1: sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāsyati sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāya lakṣaṇapariniṣpattiṃ paripūrayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:646_0: lakṣaṇapariniṣpattiṃ paripūrya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran samantaprabhatām ārāgayiṣyati
S06psp_6-8u:646_1: samantaprabhatām ārāgya dharmacakraṃ ca pravartayiṣyati dvādaśākāran triparivartasya
S06psp_6-8u:646_2: pravartatena trisāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampiṣyate saṃprakampiṣyate pravedhiṣyate saṃpravedhiṣyate,
S06psp_6-8u:648: sarve ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsena sphāriṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:649_0: tasya punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śabdo niścariṣyati tatra ye trisāhasre
S06psp_6-8u:649_1: mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās taṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyanti te sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttareṣu triṣu yāneṣu,
S06psp_6-8u:650_0: evaṃ bahuprakārā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā yasyāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:650_1: sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāptavyāḥ. evaṃ khalu
S06psp_6-8u:652_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:653: nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpadānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:655: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:657_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
S06psp_6-8u:657_1: viharati dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati maitrīkaruṇāṃ muditām
S06psp_6-8u:657_3: upasaṃpadya viharati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhīṃ bhāvayati vidyutopamañ ca samādhiṃ
S06psp_6-8u:657_4: bhāvayati vajropamañ ca samādhiṃ bhāvayati yatra samādhau sthitvā ye kecit samādhayaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:658: śrāvakasamādhir vā pratyekabuddhasamādhir vā ye 'py anye samādhigaṇās tān sarvān kāyena saṃspṛśyopasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:660: na ca samāpattiphalam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:661: tathā hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān samādhīn alakṣaṇān jānāty abhāvasvabhāvatvāt tat kim alakṣaṇo dharmo 'lakṣaṇaṃ dharmam āsvādayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:663: so 'nāsvādayan na kasyacit samāpatter vaśenopapatsyate kāmadhātau vā rūpadhātau vārūpyadhātau vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:664: tathā hi sa tān dhātūn nopalabhate yo 'pi samāpadyeta yena vā samāpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:665: tam api nopalabhate 'nupalaṃbhamāno 'lakṣaṇāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati sa tayā dhyānapāramitayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:666: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:667: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:669_0: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito bahirdhāśūnyatāyām
S06psp_6-8u:669_1: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito na ceha śūnyatāsu
S06psp_6-8u:670: srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vānāgāmiphale vārhattve vā pratyekabuddhatve vā yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vā sāpi śūnyā śūnyatayā,
S06psp_6-8u:673: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāmaḥ? katamo niyāmaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:674: bhagavān āha: sarvaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopalaṃbha ātmaḥ sarvānupalaṃbho niyāmaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:675: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavann upalaṃbhaḥ? katamo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:676: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopalaṃbhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:678: cakṣur upalaṃbhaḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana upalaṃbho,
S06psp_6-8u:682: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur upalaṃbhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:684: avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhāvo jātir jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā upalaṃbhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:685_0: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny
S06psp_6-8u:688: niyāmaḥ punaḥ subhūte yatraiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravyāhāro nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:689_0: rūpasya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya
S06psp_6-8u:689_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvabodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām
S06psp_6-8u:690: tathā hi subhūte rūpasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāro vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:691: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ (PSP_6-8:38)
S06psp_6-8u:692: sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvabodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:693_1: so 'pravyāhāraḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñānāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāro daśānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:697: niyāmam akrānto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samādhiparipūrṇo na samāpattivaśenopapadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:698_0: prāg eva rāgaṃ vā doṣaṃ vā mohaṃ votpādayed yatra sthitvā tat karmābhisaṃskuryād
S06psp_6-8u:698_1: yena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa caturṇāṃ dhyānānām anyatamenopapadyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate
S06psp_6-8u:698_2: 'nyatra māyopameṣu sthitvā sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti na ca sattvānupalabhamānaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:698_3: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:698_4: mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayati,
S06psp_6-8u:700_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopamān
S06psp_6-8u:700_1: dharmān parijānāti pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān
S06psp_6-8u:702: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:703: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnopamān sarvadharmān parijānāti?
S06psp_6-8u:704: pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca sarvadharmān parijānāti?
S06psp_6-8u:706: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na svapnaṃ na svapnadarśinaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:714: na gandharvanagaraṃ na gandharvanagaradarśinaṃ ca paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:716_0: pratiśrutkā viparyāsaḥ pratibhāso viparyāsaḥ pratibiṃbaṃ viparyāso marīcir viparyāso
S06psp_6-8u:716_1: māyā viparyāso nirmitako viparyāso gandharvanagaraṃ viparyāsa eṣa bālapṛthagjanānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:716_2: punar nāpi svapnadarśanaṃ nāpi svapnadarśī na pratiśrutkādarśanaṃ nāpi pratiśrutkādarśī
S06psp_6-8u:722: evaṃ yāvan nārhan na pratyekabuddho na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:723_0: tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā asadbhūtā ye 'bhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās
S06psp_6-8u:723_1: te pariniṣpannās tatra kiṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bhāvasaṃjñī
S06psp_6-8u:723_2: bhaviṣyati pariniṣpannasaṃjñī vāsadbhūtasaṃjñī vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:724: na sā prajñāpāramitā syād yadi kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvo bhavet pariniṣpattir vā sadbhūtatā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:725: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na rūpe sajjati,
S06psp_6-8u:726: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sajjati,
S06psp_6-8u:729: na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau nārūpyadhātau sajjati,
S06psp_6-8u:736: na sajjati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:737: tatra cchandarāgaṃ notpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:739: tat kiṃ tatra cchandarāgaṃ kariṣyaty evaṃ dvitīyāṃ bhūmiṃ tṛtīyāṃ bhūmiñ caturthāṃ bhūmiṃ pañcamīṃ bhūmiṃ (PSP_6-8:40)
S06psp_6-8u:740: ṣaṣṭhīṃ bhūmiṃ saptamīṃ bhūmim aṣṭamīṃ bhūmiṃ navamīṃ bhūmiṃ daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:741: tatra cchandarāgaṃ notpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:742: tathā hi sa tā bhūmīr nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:744: evaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau caran sarvadharmāś ca tatra prajñāpāramitāyām antargatān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:745: tāṃś ca sarvadharmān nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:746: tathā hi te sarvadharmāḥ sā ca prajñāpāramitādvayādvaidhīkārāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:747: tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścid bhedo 'sti dharmadhātunirdeśena tathatānirdeśena bhūtakoṭinirdeśenāsaṃbhinnāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:748: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:749: yadi bhagavānn asaṃbhinnatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ tatra kathaṃ kuśaladharmanirdeśo bhavati sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāñ ca dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:750: laukikalokottarāṇāṃ vā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:752_0: subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā kasyacid dharmasya pravyāhāraḥ saṃskṛtasya vāsaṃskṛtasya
S06psp_6-8u:752_1: vā srotaāpattiphalasya vā sakṛdāgāmiphalasya vānāgāmiphalasya vārhattvasya vā pratyekabodher
S06psp_6-8u:754: bhagavān āha: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:755: asaṃbhinnāḥ sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā anutpannā avinirbhogāḥ sarvadharmā na mayā subhūte sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā,
S06psp_6-8u:756: kaścid dharmopalabdho rūpam iti vā vedaneti vā saṃjñeti vā saṃskārā iti vā vijñānam iti vā skandhadhātvāyatanānīti vā pratītyasamutpannā iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:757: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānīti vā kāmadhātur vā rūpadhātur vārūpyadhātur vā,
S06psp_6-8u:758_0: kuśalākuśalā vā dharmāḥ sāsravā vānāsravā vā sāvadyā vānavadyā vā saṃskṛtam iti vāsaṃskṛtam
S06psp_6-8u:758_1: iti vā yāvac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:758_2: pratyekabodhir vā bodhisattvatā vā samyaksaṃbodhir vā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:758_3: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:760: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāve kuśalena bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:764: yatra sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān vinayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:765: ye vinītatvās triṣu bhaveṣu na dṛśyante,
S06psp_6-8u:766: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam alakṣaṇayogena.
S06psp_6-8u:769: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyām ekakṣaṇābhisamayādhikāraḥ śikṣāparisamāptiparivartaḥ saptamaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:773_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣām eva svapnopamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avastukānām abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:773_1: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ sarvākārapariśuddhānām anāśravāṇāṃ yā prakṛtir ekalakṣaṇā yad
S06psp_6-8u:773_2: utālakṣaṇā sa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho veditavyaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:774: subhūtir āha: katame punas te bhagavann anāsravāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:776_0: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāś catvāry apramāṇāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
S06psp_6-8u:776_1: daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni aṣṭāv abhinnāyatanāni araṇasamādhiḥ praṇidhijñānam ṣaḍ abhijñāś
S06psp_6-8u:776_2: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayo daśa pāramiā daśabalāni catvāri
S06psp_6-8u:776_3: vaiśāradyāni trīṇy akṣarāṇi trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamudghāto
S06psp_6-8u:776_4: mahākaruṇā sarvākārajñatā mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā ca ime ucyante subhūte anāsravāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:776_5: sarvadharmā iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāip śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:778_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā teṣām eva dharmāṇām adhigamād anuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:778_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇair
S06psp_6-8u:778_2: aśītyā cānuvyañjanair alaṃkṛtakāyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:778_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:780_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā teṣām eva sarvadharmāṇām avigamenānuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:780_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣv anantāparyanteṣu
S06psp_6-8u:781: sarvakālan nānānirmāṇameghena sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:783: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:784: kathaṃ bhagavan svapnopamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avastukānām abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:785: ime kuśalā ime 'kuśalā ime laukikā ime lokottarā ime sāsravā ime 'nāsravā ime saṃskṛtā ime 'saṃskṛtā ime srotraāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartante,
S06psp_6-8u:791_2: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ vyavasthānam ime kuśalā ime 'kuśalā ime laukikā ime lokottarā
S06psp_6-8u:791_3: ime sāsravā ime 'nāsravā ime saṃskṛtā ime 'saṃskṛtā ime srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartante,
S06psp_6-8u:797: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:798: iha subhūte bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ svapnam upalabhate svapnadarśinam upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:811_0: kāyena vācā manasā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyān abhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskaroti. kāyena vācā manasā
S06psp_6-8u:811_1: tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dvayoḥ śūnyatayoḥ sthitvātyantaśunyatāyām
S06psp_6-8u:812_0: śūnyam idaṃ traidhātukaṃ nāsty atra rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:812_1: vā skandhā vā dhātavo vāyatanāni vā pratiśrutkaiṣā pratibhāsa eṣa marīcir eṣā nirmitaka
S06psp_6-8u:812_2: eṣa gandharvanagaram etan nāsty atra rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:812_3: vā skandhadhātavo vāyatanāni vā nāsty atra svapno na svapnasya draṣṭā,
S06psp_6-8u:820: 'pi tu sarva ete dharmā avastukā abhāvasvabhāvās tatra bhavanto 'skandhe skandhasaṃjñinaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:822: api tu khalu punaḥ pratītyasamutpannā ete sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitāḥ karmavipākaparigṛhītāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:823: kiṃ punar yūyam avastukeṣu dharmeṣu vastusaṃjñām utpādayathaivaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye matsariṇaḥ sattvās tān mātsaryān nivartayati,
S06psp_6-8u:825: teṣāñ ca sa dānaparityāgo mahābhogatāyai saṃvartate,
S06psp_6-8u:828: teṣāṃ sa śīlasamādānajaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ svargopapattaye bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:829: sa tāṃs tata uccālya samādhau niyojayati sa teṣāṃ samāpattijaḥ puṇyaskandho brahmalokopapāttaye bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:830_0: evaṃ prathamād dhyānād dvitīye dhyāne dvitīyād dhyānāt tṛtīye dhyāne tṛtīyād dhyānāc
S06psp_6-8u:830_1: caturthe dhyāne caturthād dhyānād ūrdhvam ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattāv
S06psp_6-8u:831: sa tasmād api dānād dānaphalāc cānekaparyāyaṃ (PSP_6-8:46)
S06psp_6-8u:833: sa tasmāc chīlāc chīlaphalāc cānekaparyāyaṃ vivecyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:834: sa tebhyo dhyānebhyo dhyānaphalebhyaś ca samāpattibhyaḥ samāpattiphalebhyaś cānekaparyāyaṃ vivecyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:835_0: evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcasv
S06psp_6-8u:835_1: indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅgikamārge triṣu vimokṣamukheṣv
S06psp_6-8u:835_2: aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu
S06psp_6-8u:835_3: vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu niveśayati
S06psp_6-8u:836: sa ebhir anāsravair dharmair arūpibhir anidarśanair apratighair ye srotraāpattiphale sthāsyanti tān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:837: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale sthāsyanti tān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:840: ye pratyekabodhau sthāsyanti tān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:842: teṣāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhimārgam ākhyāti upadiśati samuttejayati,
S06psp_6-8u:844: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavanatam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:845: āścaryam etat bhagavann adbhuto dharmo yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:846: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇām atyantaśūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:847_0: ime kuśalā dharmā ime 'kuśalā dharmā ime laukikā dharmā ime lokottarā dharmā ime
S06psp_6-8u:847_1: sāsravā dharmā ime 'nāsravā dharmā ime sāvadyā dharmā ime 'navadyā dharmā ime saṃskṛtā
S06psp_6-8u:848: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:849_0: evam etat subhūte evam etat āścaryam idaṃ subhūte paramāścaryam idaṃ bodhisattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:849_1: mahāsattvasyādbhuto dharmo yad iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:850: sacet tvaṃ subhūte jānīyā yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāścaryādbhuto dharmas (PSP_6-8:47)
S06psp_6-8u:851_0: taṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api ca evam api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na sukaraḥ
S06psp_6-8u:851_1: pratikāraḥ kartuṃ tad yuṣmābhiḥ sarvair bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śakyaḥ sarvadharmā bhāvayituṃ syāt.
S06psp_6-8u:852: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:853: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāścaryādbhūto dharmo yo na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyate?
S06psp_6-8u:854: bhagavān āha: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhuś ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te,
S06psp_6-8u:855: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīd,
S06psp_6-8u:857_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vipākajāsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
S06psp_6-8u:857_1: sthitvā pañcasv abhijñāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu dhāraṇīmukheṣu catasṛṣu
S06psp_6-8u:857_2: pratisaṃvitsu sthitvā daśadiglokadhātuṣu ye sattvā dānenānugrahītavyās tān dānenānugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:858: ye śīlena ye kṣāntyā ye vīryeṇa ye dhyānena ye prajñayā ye prathamena dhyānena ye dvitīyena dhyānena ye tṛtīyena dhyānena ye caturthena dhyānena,
S06psp_6-8u:859: ye ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattyā ye vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattyā ye ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattyā ye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattyānugrahītavyās tān anugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:860: ye maitryānugrahītavyā ye karuṇayā ye muditayā ye upekṣayā ye caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:865: ye saptabhir bodhyaṅgair ye āryāṣṭāṅgikena mārgeṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:866: ye śūnyatayā ye ānimittena ye 'praṇihitena samādhinānugrahītavyās tān śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhibhir anugṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:867: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānena sattvān anugṛhṇāti?
S06psp_6-8u:869: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāty annam annārthikebhyo dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:870: pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo yānaṃ yānārthikebhyaḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāśayanāsanaṃ yāvad anyatarānyataraṃ mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkāraṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:872_1: sakṛdāgāmibhyaḥ srotaāpannebhyaḥ samyaggatebhyaḥ samyakpratipannebhyas tathāiva tiryagyonigatebhyaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:872_2: sarvebhyo 'nānātvena dānan dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:873: tathā hy anānātvaṃ sarvadharmaṃ jñātvā anānātvaṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:874: anānātvaṃ dānaṃ datvā anānātvasya dharmasya lābhī bhavati yad uta sarvākārajñatāyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:875: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittam utpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:876: samyaksaṃbuddhā me dakṣiṇīyā na tiryagyonigatā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:877: na bodhisattvadharmo bhavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:878_0: na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhāya cittam utpādyaivam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_6-8u:878_1: saṃprasthita ime mayā sattvā dānenānugrahītavyā ime mayā sattvā dānenānugrahītavyā iti cintayati,
S06psp_6-8u:882: tenaiva ca dānānugraheṇa tribhir yānair anupariśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:883: saced ete bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ janapadabalakāyā avadhyāyeran tena nānyathācittam utpādayitavyaṃ dāsyāmi vā na vā,
S06psp_6-8u:884: api tu akopitamānasena janapadabalakāyebhyo dānaṃ dātavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:885_0: tathā hi tasya janapadabalakāyasyārthāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:885_1: evaṃ ca punar vikalpayed garhyo bhaveyaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:885_2: mahāsattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānām arhatāṃ śaikṣāṇāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurasya ca lokasya
S06psp_6-8u:885_3: kenāyam adhīṣṭaḥ sarvasattvānām ahaṃ trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmi parāyaṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇam iti.
S06psp_6-8u:886: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā manuṣyabhūtā vāmanuṣyabhūtā vāgatyāṅgapratyaṅgāni yāceran,
S06psp_6-8u:888: dāsyāmi vā na dāsyāmi vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:889: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānām arthāya sañcintya āśrayaḥ parigṛhīto 'nena mayātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:890: tenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yeṣām arthe mayātmabhāva upāttas te 'yācitakam eva gṛhītvā gacchantu. evaṃ khalu (PSP_6-8:49)
S06psp_6-8u:891: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:892: tathā hy ete dharmā atyantaśūnyatayā śūnyā na hi śūnyatā kasmaicid dadāti vā cchinatti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:893: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:894: yad utādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ satatasamitam.
S06psp_6-8u:895: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
S06psp_6-8u:901: so 'nayā dānapāramitayā paripūryā vā hy adhyātmikeṣu dharmeṣu cchidyamāneṣu evaṃ cittam utpādayiṣyati ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā.
S06psp_6-8u:903_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte paśyāmi buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:903_1: lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān saṃcintya mahānirayaṃ patitvā tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny
S06psp_6-8u:903_2: upaśāmya tribhiḥ prātihāryais teṣāṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayato yad uta
S06psp_6-8u:906_0: anuśāsanīprātihāryeṇa ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā mahāmuditayā
S06psp_6-8u:906_1: mahopekṣayā ca dharmaṃ deśayanti. tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:906_2: mahāsattvānām antike cittam atiprasādya tebhyo nirayebhyo vyuttiṣṭhanti,

S06psp_6-8u:1448: imāny ucyante 'śītyanuvyañjanāny ebhiḥ subhūte 'śītyanuvyañjanais tathāgatasye kāyaḥ samanvāgato bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmadānaṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:1449: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān evam avavadaty anuśāsty ete yūyaṃ kulaputrā akṣaranirhārakuśalā bhavata,
S06psp_6-8u:1451: dvyakṣaraṃ yāvad dvācatvāriṃśad akṣaraiḥ kuśalā bhavata,
S06psp_6-8u:1455_0: yavad dvācatvāriṃśadakṣaraiḥ sarvavyayopagatānupagacchata. ekasminn akṣare dvācatvāriṃśad
S06psp_6-8u:1455_1: akṣarāṇy antargatāni bhāvayata. dvācatvāriṃśadakṣareṣv ekākṣaram antargataṃ bhāvayata.
S06psp_6-8u:1455_2: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvācatvāriṃśadakṣarāṇy ekasminn akṣare kuśalo bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:1457: akṣarābhinirhārakauśalaṃ bhāvayitvākṣarābhinirhārakuśalo bhavati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmakuśalo 'kṣarakuśalaś ca sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:1459: te ca sattvā nopalabhyante, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1460: ākāśanirmitā hi subhūte sattvā dharmāś ca veditavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:1461: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:1465_0: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:1465_1: caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:1465_2: caran saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣu sarvaśūnyatāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu
S06psp_6-8u:1465_3: vimokṣamukheṣv aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu
S06psp_6-8u:1466: catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣv aśītyanuvyañjaneṣu ṣaṭsv abhijñāsu vipākajāsu caran sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:1472: na cānupalabdhyā sattvaprajñaptir na ca sattvāprajñaptyā rūpaṃ prajñāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:1476: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati?
S06psp_6-8u:1478: 'saṃvidyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu sattvān samādāpayed viparyāse viniyojayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1479: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvam eva tāvan nopalabhate prāg eva bodhipākṣikān dharmān.
S06psp_6-8u:1480: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:1489_0: ātmaśūnyatā sattvaśūnyatā jīvaśūnyatā jantuśūnyatā poṣaśūnyatā puruṣaśūnyatā pudgalaśūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:1489_1: manujaśūnyatā mānavaśūnyatā kārakaśūnyatā vedakaśūnyatā jānakaśūnyatā paśyakaśūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:1499_0: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva imān sarvadharmān śūnyā iti dṛṣṭvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
S06psp_6-8u:1499_1: yathā caiteṣu śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu samādāpayed viparyāse na niyojayet. sa evaṃ sarvadharmān
S06psp_6-8u:1499_2: anāvaraṇato jñātvā na kaṃcid dharmaṃ vikopayati na 'dvaidhīkaroti,
S06psp_6-8u:1500: yathābhūtaṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito 'nekāni nirmitakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇy abhinirmāya kāṃścid dāne niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:1501_0: kāṃścic chīle kāṃścit kṣāntau kāṃścid vīrye kāṃścid dhyāne kāṃścit prajñāyāṃ kāṃścid
S06psp_6-8u:1501_1: dhyāneṣu kāṃścid apramāṇeṣu kāṃścid ārūpyasamāpattiṣu kāṃścit saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:1503: kāṃścid adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ kāṃścid yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ kāṃścid abhijñāsu kāṃścid daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:1505: kāṃścic chrotaāpattiphale kāṃścit sakṛdāgāmiphale kāṃścid anāgāmiphale,
S06psp_6-8u:1507: kāṃścit pratyekabodhau kāṃścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niyojayati. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:1508: api nu tena nirmitakena kasyacid dharmasya prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:1510: bhagavān āha: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam,
S06psp_6-8u:1511: evam ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:1512: tāṃś ca bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayati tāṃś ca sattvān viparyāsāt parimocayati,
S06psp_6-8u:1514: tathā hi subhūte rūpam abaddham amuktaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:1515: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam abaddham amuktaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:1516: yā rūpasyābaddhatāmuktatā na tad rūpaṃ yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ yā vijñānasyābaddhatāmuktatā na tad vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1519: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca yāvat sarvadharmā laukikā lokottarāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:1521: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:1523: anupalaṃbhe sarvadharmāṇāṃ sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'sthānayogena rūpaṃ śūnyam ity asthānayogena,
S06psp_6-8u:1524: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ śūnyam ity asthānayogena,
S06psp_6-8u:1525_1: yāvat sarvadharmā laukikā vā lokottarā vā sāsravā vā anāsravā vā saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā
S06psp_6-8u:1526: na hi saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā dharmāḥ kvacit sthitāḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1528: yatra tiṣṭheran na hy abhāvo 'bhāve tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:1530: na hi parabhāvaḥ parabhāve tiṣṭhati, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1531: tathā hi te sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvan nopalabhyante, yasya cānupalabdhiḥ sa kutra tiṣṭhed?
S06psp_6-8u:1534: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāñ ca śrāvakānāṃ ca sarvāryāṇāṃ ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1535: tathā hi buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiś ca pratyekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca sarvāryaiś ca eṣaiva dharmatānubaddhānubadhya ca sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:1536: tān te dharmāṇāṃ dharmatān na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1537: tathā hi dharmadhātur na vinivartate na bhūtakoṭir vinivartate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1538: tathā hi teṣāṃ sa svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yo vinivartate.
S06psp_6-8u:1539: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:1540: yadi bhagavan dharmadhātur na vinivartate na tathatā na bhūtakoṭir vinivartate,
S06psp_6-8u:1541_0: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyad rūpam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatānyā bhūtakoṭir anye
S06psp_6-8u:1541_1: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā anyad vijñānam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatānyā bhūtakoṭir
S06psp_6-8u:1541_2: anye skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca anyo dharmadhātur
S06psp_6-8u:1542: evaṃ yāvad anye sarvadharmā laukikā vā lokottarā vā sāsravā vā anāsravā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:1544: anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1546: na subhūte 'nyad rūpaṃ anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatānyā bhūtakoṭir anye vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā anyad vijñānam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatānyā bhūtakoṭir,
S06psp_6-8u:1548: ca nānyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭir,
S06psp_6-8u:1549: evaṃ yāvan nānye laukikā lokottarāḥ sāsravā anāsravāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā dharmā anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:1550: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:1551_0: yadi bhagavan nānyad rūpaṃ nānyo dharmadhātur nānyā tathatā nānyā bhūtakoṭir nānye
S06psp_6-8u:1551_1: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā nānyad vijñānaṃ nānyo dharmadhātur nānyā tathatā nānyā bhūtakoṭir
S06psp_6-8u:1551_2: nānye skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca nānyo dharmadhātur
S06psp_6-8u:1551_3: nānyā tathatā nānyā bhūtakoṭir yāvan nānye sarvadharmā laukikā lokottarāḥ sāsravā
S06psp_6-8u:1552: saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ nanyo dharmadhātur nānyā tathatā nānyā bhūtakoṭis tat kathaṃ bhagavan phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:1553: kṛṣṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛṣṇo vipāko narakā vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā,
S06psp_6-8u:1554: śuklānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śuklo vipāko devā manuṣyāś ca,
S06psp_6-8u:1557: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vā yāvat samyaksaṃbodhir vā.
S06psp_6-8u:1558: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:1559: saṃvṛttisatyaṃ subhūte pramāṇīkṛtya phalavyavasthānaṃ nirdiśyate na punaḥ paramārthasatyena phalavyavasthānaṃ śakyan nirdṛṣṭum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1560: avikalpā hi subhūte sarvadharmā apravyāhārā yad uta anātmasvarūpāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:1561: yeṣām anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānaṃ yad uta svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya.
S06psp_6-8u:1562: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:1563: yadi bhagavan saṃvṛttisatyam upādāya phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:1564: na bhagavan paramārthena tadā sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:1570: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:1571_0: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte sarvabālapṛthagjanāḥ saṃvṛttisatyaṃ vā paramārthasatyaṃ vā prajānanti
S06psp_6-8u:1571_1: yat teṣām api phalavyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati yadi prajānīyuḥ saṃvṛttisatyaṃ paramārthasatyam
S06psp_6-8u:1571_2: iti naiva bālapṛthagjanā iti saṃkhyātāḥ syur yasmāt tu teṣāṃ nāsti parijñānaṃ tasmān
S06psp_6-8u:1571_3: nāsti teṣāṃ phalavyavasthānam. srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:1571_4: vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vā samyaksaṃbodhir vā yat subhūte bālapṛthagjanānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:1571_5: na mārgo na mārgavyavasthānaṃ na mārgaphalaṃ tat kuto bālapṛthagjanānāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_6-8u:1572: yad āryapudgalānāṃ punaḥ subhūte mārgo mārgabhāvanā ca tasmād āryapudgalānāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:1573: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃ punar (PSP_6-8:73)
S06psp_6-8u:1574: bhagavan mārgabhāvanāyaṃ phalaprādurbhāvo bhavati, phalaṃ vā prāpayati?
S06psp_6-8u:1576: na hi mārgaṃ bhāvayataḥ subhūte phalaprāptir bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:1580: na ca punar amārge sthitvā phalaṃ prāpnoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:1581: na ca bhāgacchedena saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau phalavyavasthānam.
S06psp_6-8u:1583: yadi bhagavan na bhāgacchedena saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:1584: kathaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ punar bhagavatā idaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:1588: pratyekabodhir yat kiñcit samudayadharmi sarvantaṃ nirodhadharmi,
S06psp_6-8u:1589_0: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇam. syād yathāhaṃ bhagavato
S06psp_6-8u:1589_1: bhāṣitasyārtham ājāne tathā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāgacchedena phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:1591: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir vā saṃskṛtā ete utāsaṃskṛtāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:1592: subhūtir āha: asaṃskṛtā bhagavann asaṃskṛtāḥ sugata.
S06psp_6-8u:1593: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte asaṃskṛtasya dharmasya bhāgacchedo 'sti?
S06psp_6-8u:1596_0: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte yasmin samaye kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtān dharmān
S06psp_6-8u:1596_1: ekalakṣaṇān pratividhyati yad utālakṣaṇās tasmin samaye kasyacid dharmasya bhāgacchedaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:1596_2: karoti saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā dharmā iti?
S06psp_6-8u:1600: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:1601: abhāgacchedatām upādāya. yad utādhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya,

S06psp_6-8u:1606_1: vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vā prathame vā dhyāne dvitīye vā dhyāne tṛtīye vā dhyāne caturthe vā dhyāne,

S06psp_6-8u:1608: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau vā vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattau vā ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattau vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau vā,
S06psp_6-8u:1609_0: smṛtyupasthāneṣu vā samyakprahāṇeṣu vā ṛddhipādeṣu vā indriyeṣu vā baleṣu vā bodhyaṅgeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:1609_1: vā āryāṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣu vā āryasatyeṣu vā aṣṭavimokṣamukheṣu vā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu
S06psp_6-8u:1609_2: vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu vābhijñāsu vādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ vā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:1609_3: vādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ vā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ vā samādhiṣu vā dhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_6-8u:1611_0: so nābhiniviṣṭo na kvacit sajjati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito dānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:1611_1: dadāti na ca dānaphaleṣu sajjati na ca dānaphalaṃ pratyanubhavaty anyatra sattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:1611_2: paritrāṇāya yāvat sāsravānāsraveṣu dharmeṣu laukikalokottareṣu saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛteṣu
S06psp_6-8u:1611_3: dharmeṣu na kvacit tiṣṭhati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:1612: tathā hy asya sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ supratividdhaṃ bhavati.

S06psp_6-8u:1614: kathaṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ supratividdhaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:1616_0: yathā subhūte nirmitasyāsamudācāro rāgadoṣamoheṣv asamudācāro rūpe vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ
