S06psp_6-8u:2046: sa tvam atra dhyāne sthitvā yad yad evaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kariṣyasi kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2047: yadi vā dānan dāsyasi yadi vā śīlaṃ rakṣasi yadi vā kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2048: yadi vā vīryam ārabhase yadi vā dhyānam utpādayiṣyasi yadi vā prajñā bhāvayiṣyasi,
S06psp_6-8u:2051_0: yadi vāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattīr yadi vābhijñā yadi vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisamvido
S06psp_6-8u:2051_1: yadi vā mahāmaitrī yadi vā mahākaruṇā yadi vāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān yadi vā
S06psp_6-8u:2051_2: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni yadi vāśītyanuvyañjanāni yadi vā śrāvakamārgaṃ yadi
S06psp_6-8u:2051_3: vā pratyekabuddhamārgaṃ yadi vā bodhisattvamārgaṃ yadi vā buddhamārgaṃ yadi vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2051_4: yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ yadi vānāgāmiphalaṃ yadi vārhattvaṃ yadi vā pratyekabodhiṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2052: sarvākārajñatāṃ yadi vā sattvān paripācayiṣyasi yadi vā buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyasi,
S06psp_6-8u:2053: tasya te ime kuśalā dharmā alpakṛcchreṇa prādurbhaviṣyanti prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2054: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2056: kiṃ kuśalagaveṣī sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ satatasamitaṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:2058: yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2059_0: sa tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na jātu vipraṇakṣyati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_6-8u:2059_1: abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syād dhāraṇīpratilabdhaś ca satatasamitaṃ bhavaty ahīṇendriyo yadi
S06psp_6-8u:2059_2: vā kāyendriyeṇa yadi vā vāgindriyeṇa yadi vā manaindriyeṇa.
S06psp_6-8u:2061: tathā hi sarvākārajñatāṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayaty anayā sarvākārajñatayā subhāvitayā sarvamārgāḥ subhāvitā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2062: yadi vā śrāvakamārgo yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārgo yadi vā bodhisattvamārgas tasyābhijñā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitam upakārībhūtā bhaviṣyanty avipraṇāśayogeṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:2063: sa tāsu vaipākikīṣv abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti na parihīyate pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃsarann,
S06psp_6-8u:2064: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvopāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:2065: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvopāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2066: sa tayā prajñāpāramitayā subhāvitayā sattvān evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:2067_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yad yad evaṃ karma karoṣi kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā tat sarvam
S06psp_6-8u:2067_1: amṛtādhigamāya pariṇāmaya tathā te ete dharmāḥ sarva amṛtāvigamāya bhaviṣyanty amṛtaparyavasānāya ca,
S06psp_6-8u:2068: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmo 'bhiniviśate yaḥ parihīyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2069: na hi śūnyatā parihīyate, na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāḥ kaścit parihīyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2070: tathā hi prakṛtiśūnyatā na bhāvo nābhāvas tat kim abhāvo 'bhāve dharme parihāsyaty,
S06psp_6-8u:2072: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:2073: sa evam avavadann evam anuśāsan na jātv akarmako 'bhūt,
S06psp_6-8u:2074: sa ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vartate,
S06psp_6-8u:2075_0: parāṃś ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayaty evaṃ pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge
S06psp_6-8u:2075_1: samanvāgata upoṣadhe. ātmanā ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate parāṃś ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2076: ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihāre samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2077: ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihāre samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2080: ātmanā ca satatasamitam upekṣāvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitam upekṣāvihāre samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2081: ātmanā ca smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān bhāvayanti parāṃś ca smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2082: ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayati parāṃś ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2083: ātmanā ca sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu ca śikṣate parāṃś ca sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvapāramitāsu ca samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2084: ātmanā ca daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu śikṣate parāṃś ca daśabalavaiśāradyapratisamvidāvenikabuddhadharmeṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2085: ātmanā ca dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati parāṃś ca dvātriṃsanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanapariniṣpattaye samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2087: jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2088: ātmanā ca sakṛdāgāmiphale jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2089: ātmanā cānāgāmiphale jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś cānāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2090: ātmanā cārhattve jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś cārhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2091: ātmanā ca pratyekabodhau jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2092: ātmanā cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mārgam utpādayati parāṃś ca tatra mārge 'vavadaty anuśāsti pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu (PSP_6-8:96)
S06psp_6-8u:2093: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacaryāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena na jātv akarmako 'bhūt.
S06psp_6-8u:2094: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2095: yadi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvā upalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:2097: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisaṃpratiṣṭhate?
S06psp_6-8u:2098: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2099: yathā vadasi prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvā upalabhyante na dharmo nādharmaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2100: yadi punaḥ subhūte prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā abhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyām abhisaṃprāsthāsyad,
S06psp_6-8u:2101: evaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya prakṛtiśūnyaṃ dharmaṃ deśayed,
S06psp_6-8u:2104: vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pañcaskandhāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2105: dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśadhātavaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2106_0: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
S06psp_6-8u:2106_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni
S06psp_6-8u:2107_0: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni
S06psp_6-8u:2107_1: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:2109: sarvākārajñatā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyam iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2110: yadi punaḥ subhūte 'dhyātmaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ dharmam uddekṣyad,
S06psp_6-8u:2111: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ dharmam uddekṣyan,
S06psp_6-8u:2112: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatā vinaśyati na ca kūṭasthā bhavati na ca sā punar apakrāmati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2113: na hi sā deśasthā na pradeśasthā na ca sā kvacid gacchati nāpi (PSP_6-8:97)
S06psp_6-8u:2116: yatra na kasyacid dharmasyācayo vā upacayo vopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2117: hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā eṣā sā prakṛtidharmāṇāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2118: yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhuṃ saṃprasthitā na kasyacid dharmasya prasthāne paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2121: yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān prakṛtiśūnyān dṛṣṭvā na pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2122: tathā hi na kasyacid dharmasyāvaraṇaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2125_0: yatra prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ na sattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptir nātmā na sattvo
S06psp_6-8u:2125_1: na jīvo na jantur na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako
S06psp_6-8u:2126: na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam upalabhyate yāvat sarvadharmā nādhyātmā na bahirdhā nādhyātmabahirdhā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2129: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmitasya bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā bodhisattvo vānuprabandhaṃ kalpaṃ śatasahasraṃ dharmaṃ deśayet, tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:2130: subhūte api nu te nirmitā bhavyāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāpayituṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2132: anāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāpayitum arhattvaṃ vā prāpayitum,
S06psp_6-8u:2134: subhūtir āha: no bhagavaṃs tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ bhagavan vastu nāsti.
S06psp_6-8u:2135: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2136_0: avastukānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ sa sattvo yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niveśayati
S06psp_6-8u:2136_1: pratiṣṭhāpayati srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vānāgāmiphale vā arhattve vā
S06psp_6-8u:2137: 'nyatra vipacyā sāpannāyāḥ saṃjñāyā aviparyāse niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2138: yaś cāsau viparyāsaḥ sa evāviparyāsaḥ kalpanābhiṣyandam upādāyāvikalpaś cāviparyāso,
S06psp_6-8u:2139_0: yatrāvikalpas tatra viparyāso nāsti na tatrātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantur na poṣo
S06psp_6-8u:2139_1: na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyako
S06psp_6-8u:2139_2: na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ

S06psp_6-8u:2140: eṣā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati caraṃs tāṃś ca viparyastān sattvān sattvasaṃjñāyā mocayaty,

S06psp_6-8u:2143_2: 'pi na tasya yathā na paramārtho yad utāsaṃskṛtam anutpādo 'prādurbhāvo 'bhāvaḥ,

S06psp_6-8u:2145_1: na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyako na rūpaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2145_2: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā

S06psp_6-8u:2145_8: tatra prakṛtiśūnyatā pāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ (PSP_6-8:99)
S06psp_6-8u:2146: sattvān sattvasaṃjñinaḥ sattvasaṃjñāyā mocanārthaṃ mārgajñatāyāṃ carati sa mārgajñatāyāṃ caran sarvamārgeṣu caran sarvamārgeṣu carati,

S06psp_6-8u:2157: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ cāntike tathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prakṛtiśūnyatā pāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2160: āścaryam idaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yatra nāma ime prakṛtiśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caranti,

S06psp_6-8u:2162: anyā vedanā anyā saṃjñā anye saṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:2165: anyā pāramitā anyāni śūnyatāmukhāny anye bodhipakṣyā dharmā anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2170: prakṛtiśūnyataivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir eva prakṛtiśūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:2172: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2173: yadi subhūte 'nyad rūpaṃ syād anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2174: anyā vedanā anyā saṃjñā anye saṃskārā,

S06psp_6-8u:2183: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbhotsyate. yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2187_0: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_6-8u:2187_1: sarvavimokṣāḥ sarvasamāpattayaḥ sarvābhijñāḥ sarvāṇi dhyānāni sarvāṇy apramāṇāni
S06psp_6-8u:2187_2: sarvā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvatathāgatabalāni sarvabodhisattvabhūmayaś catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_6-8u:2189: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbudhyeta,
S06psp_6-8u:2192: yāvad bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃbudhyeta. yasmāt subhūte prakṛtiśūnyataiva rūpaṃ rūpam eva prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2196: tasmāt subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyān sarvadharmān viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ pratiṣṭhet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2197: na hi tatra kaścid dharmo vinaśyati vā kūṭastho vā bhavaty avakrāmati vānyatra sadevako lokaḥ samārakaḥ sabrahmakaḥ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikā prajāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2199: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān,
S06psp_6-8u:2205: caranti te 'haṃkāramamakārāv abhiniviśyādhyātmikabāhyāni vastūni abhiniviśanta upalabhante,
S06psp_6-8u:2207: vedanāṃ vedanātvena saṃjñāṃ saṃjñātvena saṃskārān saṃskāratvena,

S06psp_6-8u:2211: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā rūpaṃ na vikopayati śūnyam iti vāśūnyam iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2213: vijñānaṃ na vikopayati śūnyam iti vāśūnyam iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2215_1: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06psp_6-8u:2215_2: na vikopayati śūnyā iti vāśūnyā iti vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2216: na hi śūnyatā vikopayatīdaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime saṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:2217: idaṃ vijñānam ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni,
S06psp_6-8u:2218: iyaṃ śūnyatā ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā imāny āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06psp_6-8u:2219: imāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā ime daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā iyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nākāśam ākāśaṃ vikopayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2220: adhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā na cādhyātmikam ākāśaṃ bāhyam ākāśaṃ vikopayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2221: na ca bāhyam ākāśam ādhyātmikam ākāśaṃ vikopayaty,

S06psp_6-8u:2223: na ca śūnyatā rūpaṃ vikopayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2224: na hi tasya svabhāvo 'sti ya evaṃ vikopayaty ayaṃ śūnyo 'yaṃ na śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2226: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2227: yadi bhagavan na bhedaḥ sarvadhrmāṇāṃ kuto bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprasthito bhavaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ? na (PSP_6-8:102)
S06psp_6-8u:2228: hi bhagavan dvaidhīkārā bodhir, na dvayacaritena śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
S06psp_6-8u:2229: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2230: na dvayacaritasya bodhir na dvaidhīkārā bodhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2232: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dvaidhīkāreṇa carati bodhau,
S06psp_6-8u:2233: naiva ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhī rūpe carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2234: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06psp_6-8u:2236: na skandhadhātvāyataneṣu carati na pratītyasamutpādeṣu carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2244: na samyaksaṃbodhau carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2245: na hi bodhir aham iti śabdo rūpe carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2247: na bodhir aham iti śabdo vijñāne carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2248: evaṃ yāvan na bodhir aham iti śabdaḥ samyaksaṃbodhau carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2249: na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya samyaksaṃbodhir udgrahe carati.
S06psp_6-8u:2250: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2251: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nodgrahe carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2252: kutra tarhi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiś carati?

S06psp_6-8u:2259: yadā bhagavann atyanto 'rhan na svapiti kutaḥ svapne buddhiś caraty udgrahe vānudgrahe vā?
S06psp_6-8u:2260: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na bodhir udgrahe vānudgrahe vā carati.
S06psp_6-8u:2261: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2262: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhir nodgrahe vānudgrahe vā carati na (PSP_6-8:103)

S06psp_6-8u:2264_10: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2264_12: pañcasv abhijñāsv asthitvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetrañ cāpariśodhya

S06psp_6-8u:2269_1: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni yāvad aśītyanuvyañjanāni mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇāṃ mahāmuditāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2270: tat punaḥ subhūte rūpaprakṛtau sthitvā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:2271_0: vijñānaprakṛtau sthitvā yāvad bodhiprakṛtau sthitvā sā ca prakṛtir upaśāntā na kasyacid
S06psp_6-8u:2271_1: dharmasyopacayaṃ vā karoty apacayaṃ vā karoty utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā ucchedaṃ vā

S06psp_6-8u:2273: sa khalu subhūte lokavyavahāraprajñaptidharmam upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2274: na punar atra paramārthaṃ kaścid asti rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2275_0: vijñānaṃ vā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā pāramitā
S06psp_6-8u:2275_1: vā śūnyatā vā bodhipakṣyā vā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni

S06psp_6-8u:2287: evam etat subhūte lokavyavahāreṇa bodhisattvaḥ prajñapto lokavyavahāreṇa rūpaṃ prajñaptaṃ,

S06psp_6-8u:2290_0: na punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena samyaksaṃbodhau kaścid dharma upalabdho yasya
S06psp_6-8u:2290_1: dharmasyopacayaṃ vāpacayaṃ vā kuryād upakāraṃ vāpakāraṃ vā kuryād dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtim
S06psp_6-8u:2295: yāvat sarvadharmān upalapsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2296: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:2298: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2299_0: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃsatsu
S06psp_6-8u:2299_1: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_6-8u:2299_2: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran bodhimārgañ ca pariśodhyābhavyo 'nuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2300: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2302: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2304: na dānapratigrāhakan nāpy anyatraiteṣu dharmeṣu carati, (PSP_6-8:106)
S06psp_6-8u:2305: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo utsahate bodhimārge caritum,
S06psp_6-8u:2306: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2307: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na ca prajñām upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2308: yo vā bhāvayed yad vā bhāvayet tad api nopalabhate nāpy anyatraiteṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06psp_6-8u:2309_0: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva utsahate bodhimārge caritum. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:2309_1: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2310: evaṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2311: yo vā bhāvayati yad vā bhāvayati tad api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2313: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva utsahate bodhimārge caritum,
S06psp_6-8u:2314: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_6-8u:2315: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2316: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dāne yogam āpadyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2317: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2318: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann upāyakauśalyena rūpaṃ na yojayati na viyojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2319: tathā hi rūpasya svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2321: vijñānaṃ na yojayati na viyojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2322: tathā hi vijñānasya svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2323: evaṃ na dānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā na prajñāpāramitā yojayati na viyojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2324: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2325_0: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
S06psp_6-8u:2325_1: dharmā nādhyātmaśūnyatā na bahirdhāśūnyatā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:2326: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni na vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni nābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā yojayanti na viyojayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2327: tathā hi buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2329: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2332: na hy aśikṣitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śakyā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
S06psp_6-8u:2333: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāriputra evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2334: yathā vadasi na śakyāśikṣitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbodhuṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2335: yadi khalūpāyakauśalyena śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvam upalabhate gṛhṇāti. atha na labhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2337: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ śīlapāramitā iyaṃ dānapāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:2338: idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime saṃskārā idaṃ vijñānam ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2339: imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni imāḥ pāramitā imāḥ śūnyatā ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā imāny āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06psp_6-8u:2343: tat kiṃ grahīṣyaty agrāhyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:2353: iyaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāgrāhyapāramitā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:2354: atra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yatra śikṣamāṇo bodhiattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣām api na lapsyate, (PSP_6-8:108)
S06psp_6-8u:2355_0: kutaḥ punar bodhiṃ kutaḥ punaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kutaḥ punar bodhisattvadharmān kutaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2355_1: punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmān kutaḥ punaḥ śrāvakadharmān kutaḥ punaḥ pṛthagjanadharmān. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2356: tathā hi śāriputra na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvo vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2357_0: evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ pṛthagjanadharmaḥ katamaḥ srotaāpannaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2357_1: katamaḥ sakṛdāgāmī katamo 'nāgāmī katamo 'rhan katamaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamo bodhisattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2360: yeṣu dharmeṣu nirdiśyate pṛthagjano vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vānāgāmī vārhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā samyaksaṃbuddho vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2361: śāriputra āha: avastukānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ āgamaḥ prajñāyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2362: ayaṃ pṛthagjano 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2363: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2364: kiṃ nu śāriputra rūpasya vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2366: naitat sugatānyatra viparyastaś cittaḥ pṛthagjano rūpam ity abhiniviṣṭo,
S06psp_6-8u:2369: kiṃ nu śāriputra vijñānasya vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2371: naitat sugatānyatra viparyastacittaḥ pṛthagjano vijñānam ity abhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2373: kiṃ punaḥ śāriputra yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthakjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2375: no bhagavan naitat sugatānyatra viparyastacittaḥ pṛthagjano yāvat sarvadharmā ity abhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2377: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenāvastukān dharmān paśyann (PSP_6-8:109)
S06psp_6-8u:2380: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2381: katamaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyenāvastukān sarvadharmān paśyann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2382: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2383: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kasyacid dharmasya vastu samanupaśyati yatra vastūni pratihanyeta,
S06psp_6-8u:2384: yatra pratihanyamāna ālīyeta ālīyamānaḥ saṃsīdet kauśīdyam āpadyeta,
S06psp_6-8u:2385: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra avastukā ajīvā nirjīvā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2386_0: anyatra samohena sattvā abhiniviṣṭāḥ skandheṣu vā dhātuṣu vā āyataneṣu vā pratītyasamutpādeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2386_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu vā tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān
S06psp_6-8u:2386_2: sarvadharmān saṃpaśyamānaḥ prakṛtiśūnyān svalakṣaṇaśūnyān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_6-8u:2386_3: māyākārasadṛśam ātmānam adhiṣṭhāya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2387: ye sattvā matsariṇas teṣāṃ dānakathāṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2393: yadā te sattvā dāne pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2394: śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2395: tadā teṣāṃ sattvānām anuśāsanīṃ kathāṃ karoty āryāṃ nairyāṇikīṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2400: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2401: kiṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva aupalaṃbhiko 'saṃvidyamānāṃ sattvān dāne niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2406: prajñāyāṃ niyojayati. uttare cācāryā nairyāṇikīṃ kathāṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2411: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2412: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kaścid upalaṃbhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2413: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcit sattvam upalabhate 'nyatra saṃvṛttisaṃketena vyavaharati,
S06psp_6-8u:2414: tac chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ sthitvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2415: na hi śāriputra dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ sattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2416: api tu khalūpāyakauśalyena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2417: tat te sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharma ātmānaṃ nopalabhante,
S06psp_6-8u:2420: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2421: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2422: mahotpādo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na ca nāma bhagavan kasyacid dharmasyaikatvaṃ vā nānātvaṃ vā pṛthaktvaṃ vā upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2423: evaṃrūpaṃ ca saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate yena saṃnāhena saṃnahya na kāmadhātau dṛśyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2430: sattvāprajñaptyā sattvābandhaḥ sattvāmokṣaḥ sattvābandhāmokṣād asaṃkleśāvyavadānam asaṃkleśāvyavadānān na gatisaṃbhedaḥ prajñāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2433: yena vipākenātmanā sattvāḥ pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃdṛśyeran.
S06psp_6-8u:2434: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2435: evam etac chāriputraivam etad yathā vācaṃ bhāṣase,
S06psp_6-8u:2436: sacet pūrvaṃ sattvabhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvas tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2437: bodhisattvo 'pi tathāgato 'pi pūrvabhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvas tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2438: pañcagatiko vā saṃsāraḥ pūrvabhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvas tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2439: yasmāt tarhi śāriputrotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva eṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatānanyatathatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2440: tatra nātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantur (PSP_6-8:111)
S06psp_6-8u:2441: na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyakaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2443: kuto vedanā kutaḥ saṃjñā kutaḥ saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2445: kutaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanāni kutaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ kutaḥ pratītyasamutpannadharmāḥ kutaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni bhaviṣyanty,
S06psp_6-8u:2446: asatām eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2447_0: yataḥ sattvāḥ parimocayitavyāḥ syur yasmāt tarhi śāriputra ime dharmā īdṛśāḥ svabhāvaśūnyās
S06psp_6-8u:2447_1: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutvānuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2448: na cātra kaścid dharmasvabhāvo yam upalabhate yo vā śakyo 'dhimoktuṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2450: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate yena saṃnāhena saṃnahya na pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_6-8u:2455: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra māyākāranirmitaḥ puruṣo bahūni prāṇikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇy abhinirmimīte,
S06psp_6-8u:2457: saṃtarpyaivam udānam udānayed bahu me puṇyaṃ prasūtam iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:2458: śāriputrāpi nu tatra kaścid bhojito vā saṃtarpito vā bhavet.
S06psp_6-8u:2461_0: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
S06psp_6-8u:2461_1: caran caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2461_2: caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcendriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2461_3: āryāṣṭāṅge mārge sarvaśūnyatāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv aṣṭasu vimokṣamukheṣu navasv
S06psp_6-8u:2461_4: anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu
S06psp_6-8u:2461_5: tathāgatabaleṣu daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu (PSP_6-8:112)
S06psp_6-8u:2462: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāñ caran bodhimārgāṃ ca paripūrayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2463: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati na ca kañcit sattvam upalabhate yam upalabhya vinayet.
S06psp_6-8u:2465: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2466: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2468: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2469_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_6-8u:2469_1: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2470: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_6-8u:2471_2: caran sattvān paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2472: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati?
S06psp_6-8u:2474: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sattvebhyo dānaṃ datvā evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:2475: iha kulaputrā mā dānam āgrahaṇato grahīṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:2478: neha kulaputrā paramārthena dānaṃ na dānapatir na pratigrāhakaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2480: na ca prakṛtiśūnyā dharmān gṛhṇanty agrāhyā śūnyatā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2481: na cātra dānam upalabhate na dānapatiṃ na pratigrāhakam anupalaṃbhapāramitaiṣā (PSP_6-8:113)
S06psp_6-8u:2483: sa dānadātṛpratigrāhakān anupalaṃbhamānaḥ sattvān srotaāpattiphale niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2487: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niyojayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2490: dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye 'pi cānye dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2492: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpaṃ dānaṃ datvā kṣatriyamahāśālakulānāṃ vā sahavratāyopapadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2497: sa tatra sattvāṃś caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2500: arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca. evaṃ tān sattvān dānena saṃgṛhyānupūrveṇa śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2501_0: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2501_1: caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcasv indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptabodhyaṅgeṣv
S06psp_6-8u:2504: pratyekāṃ bodhim anuprāpayaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2506: tatra na kaścid dharmaḥ svabhāvena saṃvidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2511: evaṃ yūyam ātmanaś ca mahāntam arthaṃ kariṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:2512: parāṃś ca mahaty arthe niyojayiṣyatha. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2513: yathā caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya na jātu durgatiṃ patati,
S06psp_6-8u:2514: na jātu cakravartirājyan na kārayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2515: yādṛśaṃ hi vījaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2516: tasya cakravartino yadā yācanakā āgacchanti tadā tasya cakravartino rājña evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2517: yeṣāṃ mayā kṛtaśaś cakravartiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ nānyatra sattvānām (PSP_6-8:114)
S06psp_6-8u:2519: tad etad yuṣmākam eva dattaṃ bhavatu,
S06psp_6-8u:2520: tasmd atra na mayānena cakravartirājyenārthaḥ prāg evānye nānyatra sattvānām arthāya saṃsāra upāttaḥ sa karuṇāyamāno mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2521: yāvan mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2522: te ca sattvā nopalabhyante ye pariniṣpannāḥ syur ity anyatra saṃjñānām asaṃketaṃ vyavahāra iti,
S06psp_6-8u:2523: sa ca vyavahāraḥ pratiśrutkopamo 'pravyāhāro veditavyaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2524: yathā carato na kiṃcit sattvānām antike 'parityakṣaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2528: tāni punaḥ katamāny upakaraṇāni yad uta dānapāramitopakaraṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2533: imāni tāny upakaraṇāni yair upakaraṇair upagṛhītāḥ sattvāḥ saṃsārāt parimokṣyante.
S06psp_6-8u:2534: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasyā dānaṃ dadad evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣet,
S06psp_6-8u:2535_0: ahaṃ bho yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ śīlaṃ rakṣatāhaṃ yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annena vā
S06psp_6-8u:2535_1: pānena vā vastreṇa vā śayanāsanair vā yānair vā hiraṇyasuvarṇamanimuktāvajravaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍair vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2537: glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair vā yāvad anyatarair vā mānuṣyakaiḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇair,
S06psp_6-8u:2539: tad ahaṃ yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annādinā vā saptabhir vā ratnair,
S06psp_6-8u:2541: tad yūyaṃ saṃvaraśīle sthitvānupūrveṇa duṣkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatha tribhir yānaiḥ śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā (PSP_6-8:115) mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2542: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntisauratye niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2543: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvā ye kupyanti vā vyāpadyante vā teṣāṃ sattvānām evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06psp_6-8u:2544: kena yūyaṃ kāraṇena kulaputrā vyāpadyadhve doṣam utpādayatha?
S06psp_6-8u:2546: yasyārthena kupyatha vyāpadyatha tat mamāntikād gṛhṇītha,
S06psp_6-8u:2547_0: tena bhagavatām avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annena vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā śayanāsanair
S06psp_6-8u:2547_2: vā vividhair vā maṇiratnair vā yāvad anyatarānyatarair vā mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkārair
S06psp_6-8u:2547_3: yena yūyaṃ na kupyatha vyāpadyadhve. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_6-8u:2548_0: naivātra kaścid bhāvo 'sti yaḥ bhāvo yena yuṣmākaṃ krodha upajāyata abhūtasaṃkalpa
S06psp_6-8u:2548_1: eṣa krodho naitasya kiṃcid vastv asti yasya yūyaṃ vastunaḥ kṛtaśo 'bhisajjatha kupyatha
S06psp_6-8u:2548_2: vyāpadyadhve 'bhiṣajya kupitvā vyāpadya daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharathānyamanyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2549: tad yūyam asadbhūtasaṃkalpitakṣubhitā narakaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:2550: yā apy anyāḥ kāścid gatayas tāsu ca duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayiṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:2551: haṃbho puruṣā māvastukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ tat karma parigṛhṇīta yena parigṛhītena manuṣyapratilābho na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2552: prāg eva buddhotpādo durlabhaḥ. sa khalu punar bho puruṣo durlabho buddhotpādo durlabho manuṣyalābho durlabhaḥ kṣaṇasaṃpad durlabhaḥ saṃsārāṃ mokṣaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2553: mā imaṃ kṣaṇaṃ virāgayiṣyatha mā vicikitsā bhaviṣyatha kṣaṇaprāptāḥ. tato bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmanā ca kṣāntyā saṃpādayāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2556: ye 'pi cānye kṣāntiṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2557: tatas tān sattvān kṣāntyāṃ niyojayitvā kṣāntyāṃ sthāpayitvānupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ (PSP_6-8:116)
S06psp_6-8u:2558: parinirvāpayati śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntisauratye sattvān niyojayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2559: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_6-8u:2561: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān kuśīdān hīnavīryān alasān viditvā evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:2565: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāñ caran tān sattvān etad avocat,
S06psp_6-8u:2566: hambho puruṣā ahaṃ bhavatāṃ sarvapratyayān upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:2567: yadi vā dānaṃ yadi vā śīlaṃ yadi vā kṣāntiṃ yadi vā yair ākārair yair liṅgair vīryam ārabhedhvaṃ tān bhavatām upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:2568: tatas te sattvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upakaraṇair vīryam ārabhante kāyikaṃ vā caitasikaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2569: tena kāyikena vā caitasikena vā vīryeṇa sarvān kuśalān dharmān paripūrayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2570: yaiḥ kuśalair dharmair āryān anāsravān dharmān bhāvayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2571: yān bhāvayamānā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpsyanti sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpsyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2572: pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpsyanty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ sattvān niyojayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2573: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sattvān avavadatīha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:2574: kim idaṃ bhoḥ sattvā yūyaṃ dhyānan na samāpadyadhve?
S06psp_6-8u:2578: haṃbho purusā ahaṃ tān pratyayān upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:2580: idam iti vā bahirdhety adhyātmeti vādhyātmabahirdheti,
S06psp_6-8u:2581_0: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tān pratyayān upasaṃharati yaiḥ pratyayair
S06psp_6-8u:2581_1: upasaṃhṛtair na vitarkayanti tatas te sattvā vitarkeṣu cchinneṣu prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante,
S06psp_6-8u:2586: te tair dhyānais taiś cāpramāṇair yāvad (PSP_6-8:117)
S06psp_6-8u:2588: tatrāpare bodhimārgāṃ na parihīyante yāvad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sattvān evam avavadati.
S06psp_6-8u:2589: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2590: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:2591: kim idaṃ bhoḥ sattvā yūyaṃ prajñāpāramitān na bhāvayatha?
S06psp_6-8u:2594: tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:2595: mamopari pūrayam upakaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīta mamopary upakaraṇaṃ gṛhītvā dānaṃ dadata,
S06psp_6-8u:2596: śīlaṃ rakṣata kṣāntyā saṃpādayata vīryam ārabhadhvaṃ dhyānaṃ saṃpādayadhvam,
S06psp_6-8u:2599_0: ātmā vā sattvo vā jivo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo
S06psp_6-8u:2599_1: vā kārako vā vedako vā jānako vā paśyako vā kāmadhātur vā rūpadhātur vā ārūpyadhātur
S06psp_6-8u:2599_2: vā ṣaṭpārāmitā vā sarvaśūnyatā vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā vā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
S06psp_6-8u:2599_3: vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vāṣṭavimokṣā vā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:2599_4: vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir
S06psp_6-8u:2600_0: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcid dharmam upalabhate
S06psp_6-8u:2600_1: yam upalabhyābhiniviśeta so 'nabhiniveśamāno na kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2600_2: vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na kalpayaty ayaṃ nairayiko
S06psp_6-8u:2600_3: 'yaṃ tiryagyoniko 'yaṃ yāmalaukiko 'yam asuro 'yaṃ devo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yam amanuṣyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2601_0: ayaṃ śīlavān ayaṃ duḥśīlo ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann
S06psp_6-8u:2601_1: ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. evaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2601_2: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:2603_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2603_1: sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_6-8u:2603_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ sattvān parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2604: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām upakaraṇam upanāmayati yair upakaraṇair upagṛhītāḥ sattvāś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2605: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2606: yena mārgeṇa bhāvitena yāvat saṃsārāt parimucyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ sattvān parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:2607: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā evaṃ sattvān paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2608_0: ete yūyaṃ bhoḥ kulaputrā mamāntikād annaṃ pānaṃ yānaṃ vastrāṃ mālyaṃ gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2608_1: puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ cūrṇaṃ yāvat sarvān mānuṣyakopakaraṇapariṣkārān gṛhītvā saptabhiś ca
S06psp_6-8u:2609: tad bhavatāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya,
S06psp_6-8u:2612: yad bhavatā dīrgharātram eṣo 'rthaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśa upārjitas tad yuṣmākam evaiṣa santaka ity evaṃ gṛhītvā sattvebhyo dānaṃ dadadhvaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2613_0: tena ca dānena śīle niyojayadhvaṃ kṣāntyā niyojayadhvaṃ vīrye niyojayadhvaṃ dhyāne
S06psp_6-8u:2613_1: niyojayadhvaṃ prajñāyāṃ niyojayadhvaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu niyojayadhvaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2616_0: yāvad anuttareṣv āryeṣv anāsraveṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayadhvaṃ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
S06psp_6-8u:2616_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2619_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2619_1: sthitvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_6-8u:2620: yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā teṣāṃ pratyayānām asatāṃ dauḥśīlyam āpadyatha vyāpādaṃ kauśīdyaṃ vikṣepaṃ dauṣprajñam āpadyadhve tān pratyayān yuṣmākam upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:2621_0: annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā vastraṃ vā śayanāsanaṃ vā yāvat sarvān mānuṣyakopakaraṇapariṣkārān
S06psp_6-8u:2621_1: sa tān sattvāṃs tathārūpeṇānugraheṇānugṛhṇāti yathārūpeṇānugrahenānugṛhītāḥ samān
S06psp_6-8u:2623: atha khalv āyuṣmataḥ subhūter etad abhavat:
S06psp_6-8u:2624: katamo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yatra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena idṛśāḥ saṃnāhāḥ saṃnaddhavyāḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2625: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ subhūteś cetasaiva caitaḥ parivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2626: ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2627: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2628_3: mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ. api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmā api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:2629_0: subhūte asti sa kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ yatrāśikṣitvānuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2629_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. nāsti subhūte kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:2629_2: mahāsattvenāśikṣitavyam aśikṣitvā yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śaknoti sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
S06psp_6-8u:2630: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2632: na tu bhagavann aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2633: iyanta iti vā neyanta iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2634: ayaṃ dharmo laukiko vā lokottaro vā sāsrāvo vā anāsravo (PSP_6-8:120)
S06psp_6-8u:2635: vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā pṛthagjanadharmo vārhaddharmo vā pratyekabuddhadharmo vā buddhadharmo vā.
S06psp_6-8u:2636: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etat sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā,
S06psp_6-8u:2637: yadi punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā nābhaviṣyan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2638: yasmāt subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2639: api tu khalu subhūte yad evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_6-8u:2642: iyanta iti vā neyanta iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2643_0: ayaṃ dharmo laukiko vā lokottaro vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā
S06psp_6-8u:2643_1: pṛthagjanadharmo vārhaddharmo vā pratyekabuddhadharmo vā buddhadharmo veti. kiṃ punaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2643_2: subhūte ete sattvā evaṃ jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti yadi jānīyur naimāṃ bodhisattvā
S06psp_6-8u:2644: yasmāt tarhi subhūte na jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:2645: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2647: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhimārge caratā prathamam evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2648: nātra kaścid dharmo yaḥ svena bhāvenopalabhyate 'nyatrābhisaṃskāreṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:2649_0: tatra khalu dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam upaparīkṣeyam aham upaparīkṣamāṇo na kvacid dharme
S06psp_6-8u:2649_1: 'bhiniveśeya yadi vā pāramitāsu yadi vā śūnyatāsu yadi vā saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2649_2: dharmeṣu yadi vā srotāapattiphale yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphale yadi vānāgāmiphale yadi
S06psp_6-8u:2649_3: vārhattve yadi vā pratyekabodhau yadi vānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2650: tathā hi svabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām abhiniviśate,
S06psp_6-8u:2652: śūnyatāyām abhinivekṣyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:2654: kutreme sattvāś caranty asaṃgrahe tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2656: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:2657: ete yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā dānaṃ dadata tato yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ bhaviṣyati bhogeṣu,
S06psp_6-8u:2658_0: teṣu ca bhogeṣu mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ śīle 'vavadati tena
S06psp_6-8u:2658_1: ca śīlena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ kṣāntisauratye 'vavadati
S06psp_6-8u:2658_2: tayā ca kṣāntyā mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ vīrye 'vavadati mā
S06psp_6-8u:2658_3: ca tena vīryeṇa maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ dhyāne 'vavadati tena
S06psp_6-8u:2658_4: ca dhyānena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadati
S06psp_6-8u:2658_5: tayā ca prajñayā mā maṃsyādhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ srotaāpattiphale
S06psp_6-8u:2658_6: 'vavadati tena ca srotaāpattiphalena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2659_0: evam arhattve 'vavadati tena cārhattvena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:2659_1: evaṃ pratyekabodhāv avavadati tayā ca pratyekabodhyā mā maṃsyadhvam. evaṃ buddhadharmeṣv
S06psp_6-8u:2659_2: avavadati taiś ca buddhadharmair mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na teṣu kiṃcit sāram asti. sa evam
S06psp_6-8u:2660: na kvacid dharme 'bhiniviśate. tat kasya hetoḥ? anabhiniviṣṭāś
S06psp_6-8u:2661_0: ca sarvadharmās tathā hy eṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti ye nābhiniviśeta śūnyatāsvabhāvatām
S06psp_6-8u:2661_1: upādāya. tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārge caran na kvacit pratiṣṭhate so
S06psp_6-8u:2661_2: 'pratiṣṭhānayogena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2662: śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2663: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2664: vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2665: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2666: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2667: sa prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2668: tathā hi dhyānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yad api samāpadyate tad api śūnyaṃ yair ākāraiḥ samāpadyate te 'py ākārāḥ śūnyāḥ, evaṃ (PSP_6-8:122)
S06psp_6-8u:2672: evaṃ maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā evam ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2675: srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2676: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2677: anāgāmiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2678: 'rhattvaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2679: pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate.
S06psp_6-8u:2680: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na pratiṣṭhate?
S06psp_6-8u:2681: bhagavān āha: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ subhūte na pratiṣṭhate. katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām?
S06psp_6-8u:2682: svabhāvaś ca teṣāṃ phalaṃ nāsti yatra pratiṣṭheta yena vā pratiṣṭheta yo vā pratiṣṭheta,
S06psp_6-8u:2684: na ca mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ na prāptavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ na ca tatra sthātavyam,
S06psp_6-8u:2686: na ca mayārhattvaṃ na prāptavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ mayārhattvaṃ na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2687: na ca mayā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na prāptavyā prāptavyā mayā pratyekabuddhabhūmir na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2689: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ na pratiṣṭhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2690: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya nānyatra cittaṃ pratilabdham anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2691_0: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamām api bhūmim upādāya vartamāno 'nyatra na
S06psp_6-8u:2691_1: kiṃcic cittam utpādayaty anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ yāvad daśamīṃ bhūmim
S06psp_6-8u:2691_2: upādāya vartamāno nānyatra kiṃcic cittam utpādayaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2692_0: yāvad bodhisattvanyāmam avakrānter nānyatra kiṃcic cittam utpāditam anyatrānuttarāyāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2692_1: samyaksaṃbodher atṛptamānasaḥ. sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad eva kāyena (PSP_6-8:123)
S06psp_6-8u:2693: vā parākramate vācā vā manasā vā parākramate,
S06psp_6-8u:2694: nānyatra bodhicittāt tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicitte sthitvāvikṣiptamānaso bodhimārgam utpādayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2695: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2696: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā anutpannāḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati?
S06psp_6-8u:2697: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2698: sarvadharmā anutpannās tat punaḥ kathaṃ yenābhisaṃskurvanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2700: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2701: na punar bhagavann anutpādād vā tathāgatānām utpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā.
S06psp_6-8u:2702: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2703: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā,
S06psp_6-8u:2704: ye punar imāṃ dharmasthititān na jānanti teṣām arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati yena mārgeṇa sattvān mocayati saṃsārāt.
S06psp_6-8u:2706: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2707: kiṃ punar bhagavann anutpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate utāho utpannena?
S06psp_6-8u:2709: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan nānutpannena cotpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2711: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan naiva nānutpannena naiva notpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2713: subhūtir āha: tat kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2714: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: na subhūte mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate nāmārgeṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:2715: bodhir eva subhūte mārgaḥ, mārga eva bodhiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2717: evam ukte āyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2718: yadi bhagavan bodhir eva mārgo mārga eva bodhir anuprāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhis,
S06psp_6-8u:2720_1: vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś catasṛbhir
S06psp_6-8u:2720_2: ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmaiś caturbhir āryasatyaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2720_3: pañcabhir abhijñābhir aṣṭavimokṣair navabhir anupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhair
S06psp_6-8u:2720_4: daśabhir bodhisattvabhūmibhir daśabhiḥ pāramitābhir viṃśatibhiḥ śūnyatābhir aṣṭādaśabhir
S06psp_6-8u:2721: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:2722: subhūte buddho bodhiṃ prāpyati buddha eva bodhir eva buddhaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2724: bhagavān āha: yat punaḥ subhūtir evaṃ vadaty,
S06psp_6-8u:2725_0: anuprāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhir iti. iha subhūte yadā bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:2725_1: mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrya saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān sarvaśūnyatāś
S06psp_6-8u:2726_2: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrya vajropame samādhau
S06psp_6-8u:2726_4: tadā tathāgata iti nirdiśyate sarvadharmān jānīta ity ataḥ sarvadarśiṃ sarvajña ity abhidhīyate.
S06psp_6-8u:2728: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2729: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati?
S06psp_6-8u:2730: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2731: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya kāyadauḥśīlyaṃ (PSP_6-8:125)
S06psp_6-8u:2732: vāgdauḥśīlyaṃ manodauḥsīlyam ātmanaś ca parasya ca viśodhayati yaiḥ pariśudhaiḥ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2733: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2734: katamad bhagavan kāyadauḥśīlyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vāgdauḥśīlyaṃ manodauḥśīlyam?
S06psp_6-8u:2735: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yat kāyakarmākuśalī prāṇātipāte vartate,
S06psp_6-8u:2748_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yat mātsaryacittam idaṃ manodauḥśīlyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:2748_1: yad dauḥśīlyacittaṃ kṣobhacittaṃ kauśīdyacittaṃ vikṣepacittam asamāhitacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam
S06psp_6-8u:2749: punar aparaṃ subhūte yac chīlam apariśuddham idam apy apariśuddhaṃ dauḥśīlyacittaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06psp_6-8u:2750_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānair virahitaś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2750_1: caturbhir ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair
S06psp_6-8u:2751: punar aparaṃ subhūte yac chrotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
S06psp_6-8u:2752: idam api dauṣṭhulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yat sakṛdāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
S06psp_6-8u:2753: idam api dauṣṭhulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yad anāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
S06psp_6-8u:2754: idam api dauṣṭhulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yad arhattvasākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
S06psp_6-8u:2755: idam api dauṣṭhulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. pratyekabodhisākṣātkriyā tatra ca spṛhaṇā,
S06psp_6-8u:2761: śrotrasaṃjñā ghrāṇasaṃjñā jihvāsaṃjñā kāyasaṃjñā manaḥsaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2763: śabdasaṃjñā gandhasaṃjñā rasasaṃjñā spraṣṭavyasaṃjñā dharmasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2765: śrotravijñānasaṃjñā ghrāṇavijñānasaṃjñā jihvāvijñānasaṃjñā kāyavijñānasaṃjñā manovijñānasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2767: śrotrasaṃsparśasaṃjñā ghrāṇasaṃsparśasaṃjñā jihvāsaṃsparśasaṃjñā kāyasaṃsparśasaṃjñā manaḥsaṃsparśasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2781_0: saṃskārasaṃjñā vijñānasaṃjñā nāmarūpasaṃjñā ṣaḍāyatanasaṃjñā sparśasaṃjñā vedanāsaṃjñā
S06psp_6-8u:2781_1: tṛṣṇāsaṃjñā upādānasaṃjñā bhavasaṃjñā jātisaṃjñā jarāmaraṇasaṃjñā śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2782: strīsaṃjñā puruṣasaṃjñā kāmadhātusaṃjñā rūpadhātusaṃjñā ārūpyadhātusaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2783: kuśalasaṃjñā akuśalasaṃjñā laukikasaṃjñā lokottarasaṃjñā sāsravasaṃjñā anāsravasaṃjñā saṃskṛtasaṃjñā asaṃskṛtasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyam,
S06psp_6-8u:2787: annam annārthikānāṃ pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ vastraṃ vastrārthikānāṃ yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān sarvopakaraṇapariṣkārān dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2790: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2791: ātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣati parāṃś ca śīle samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2792: ātmanā ca kṣāntyā saṃpādayati parāṃś ca kṣāntau samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2793: ātmanā ca vīryam ārabhate parāṃś ca vīrye samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2794: ātmanā ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyate parāṃś ca dhyāne samādapayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2797: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2798: ātmanā ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇe kṛtvā triṣu ratneṣu dānaṃ dadāti tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2801: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāni vādyāni vādayati buddheṣu vā buddhacaityeṣu vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2802: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ karoti tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlena me divyāḥ śabdā manoramāḥ śrotrasukhā satatasamitaṃ vādyā bhavantu buddhakṣetre.
S06psp_6-8u:2803: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyair gandhais trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ paripūrayitvā buddheṣu vā buddhacaityeṣu vā dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2805: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlena me divyā gandhā ghrāṇasukhā manoramā bhavantu buddhakṣetre.
S06psp_6-8u:2806: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śatarasāni bhojanāni tathāgateṣu vā dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2807: tathāgataśrāvakeṣu vā tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2808: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlena buddhakṣetre me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya śrāvakasaṃghasya śatarasāni bhojanāni saṃpadyeran.
S06psp_6-8u:2809: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāny upalepanāni dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2810: tathāgateṣu vā tathāgataśrāvakeṣu vā tathāgatacaityeṣu vā,
S06psp_6-8u:2812: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlena me buddhakṣetre divyāni spraṣṭavyāni kāyasukhāni manonukūlāni (PSP_6-8:128)
S06psp_6-8u:2814: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃkalpair ātmanā ca sarvasattvaiś ca sārdhaṃ pañcakāmaguṇān buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu vā sarvasattveṣu vopanāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2816_0: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya me
S06psp_6-8u:2816_1: sarvaśrāvakasaṃghasya sarvasattvānāṃ ca manoramāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāḥ syur iti. evaṃ subhūte
S06psp_6-8u:2817: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2818: yaṃ nūnam aham ātmanā ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca prathame dhyāne niveśayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:2820: ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca caturthe dhyāne niveśayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:2823: evaṃ karuṇāmuditām ātmanā copekṣāṃ bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃ copekṣābhāvanāyāṃ niveśayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:2824: ātmanā cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2826: ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:2827: ātmanā ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:2829: ātmanā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:2830: ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2832: sarvasattvā evaṃ caturbhir dhyānair avirahitā bhāveyuś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir avirahitā bhāveyuś caturbhir brāhmair vihārair avirahitā bhaveyuḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2836: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2837: sa tāvad bodhau carati yāvad ime sarvābhiprāyāḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2840: tasya svabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇavibhūṣita ātmabhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2841: ye ca tena boodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvāḥ paripācitās teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ svabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇavibhūṣita ātmabhāvo bhavati yad uta puṇyaparigrahād,
S06psp_6-8u:2842: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhaksetraṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2843: yathā trayāṇām apāyānāṃ prajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2847: yāvad dvayasya nāmadheyam api na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2853: tyāgecchatāyāḥ yāvat prajñecchatāyāḥ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ chandād eva vṛkṣebhyo ghoṣā niścariṣyanti vāteritebhyaḥ evaṃ sarvebhyo 'dhyātmikabāhyebhyo dharmebhyo ghoṣā niścariṣyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2854: śūnyam iti vānimittam iti vāpraṇihitain iti vā śabdo niścariṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2856: yathaiva sarvadharmāṇāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ tathāiva śabdo niścariṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2858: yathaiteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathāiva śabdo niścariṣyaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2859_0: yac chūnyan na tatra nimittam asti tad apraṇihitam eṣā saivaṃ rūpādharmadeśanā niścariṣyati
S06psp_6-8u:2859_1: rātrau divase vā sthitāṇāṃ vā niṣaṇṇānāṃ vā śayanānāṃ vā caṅkramatāṃ vā idṛśāḥ sarvadharmadeśanā
S06psp_6-8u:2859_2: niścariṣyanti. tatra buddhakṣetre yadāsau bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_6-8u:2860_0: tasya khalu punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaiva
S06psp_6-8u:2860_1: sato ye daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, te (PSP_6-8:130)
S06psp_6-8u:2862_0: ye ca tasya varṇaṃ sattvā śroṣyanti nāmadheyaṃ vā te sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2862_1: samyaksaṃbodhyau. tasya khalu punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2862_2: deśayato na kasyacit sattvasya saṃśayo bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2863: ayaṃ dharmo 'yan na dharmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2864_0: yā khalu punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra kaścid adharmaḥ sarva eva sa dharmaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2864_1: tatra ye sattvā akuśalamūlagrastā vānavaropitakuśalamūlā vā buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2869: samyaksaṃbuddheṣu vāsamyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinas te 'dharme dharma iti vadanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2870: te dharmaṃ pratikṣipanti te dharmaṃ pratikṣipya kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_6-8u:2871_0: tāṃs te buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān saṃsāraparyāpannāṃs
S06psp_6-8u:2871_1: tataḥ pāpakadṛṣṭigatād vivecayanti vivecya niyate rāśau pratiṣṭhāpayanti. te tatra
S06psp_6-8u:2871_2: pratiṣṭhāpitā na punar apāyeṣūpapadyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_6-8u:2872_0: yasya pariśuddhasya na kiṃcit sattvānāṃ vaikalyaṃ bhaviṣyati laukikeṣu vā dharmeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2872_1: lokottareṣu vā dharmeṣu sāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣv anāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣu saṃskṛteṣu vāsaṃskṛteṣu
S06psp_6-8u:2872_2: vā dharmeṣu yāvat sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_6-8u:2874: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2875: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2876: bhagavān āha: niyataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2877: subhūtir āha: katame rāśau niyataḥ śrāvakarāśau vā pratyekabuddharāśau vā?
S06psp_6-8u:2879: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakarāśau vā niyataḥ pratyekabuddharāśau vā niyato 'pi tu buddharāśau subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2880: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ prathamacittotpādika (PSP_6-8:131)
S06psp_6-8u:2883: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vā niyataḥ caramabhaviko vā niyato 'pi tu prathamacittotpādiko niyataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2884: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyato 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2885: bhagavān āha: na subhūte niyataḥ patito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:2886: subhūte api tv aṣṭamako vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmi vā anāgāmi vārhan vā pratyekabuddho vā niyato 'pāyeṣūpapatsyante.
S06psp_6-8u:2889: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2890: tathā hi yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2891: maitrīṃ karuṇāṃ muditām upekṣāṃ sattveṣu bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2894: dīrghāyuṣkeṣu vā deveṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2895: yatrāpacāraḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyanteṣu vā janapadeṣūpatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2896: mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapadyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2897: tatra copapatsyate yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdaḥ śruyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2898: akriyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2899: api tu khalu subhūte prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito 'dhyāśayena daśākuśalān karmapathān adhyāpadyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_6-8u:2900: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2901: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ kuśaladharmasamanvāgato yad uta nāpratirūpeṣu sthāneṣūpapatsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:2904: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2905: na punaḥ suhbūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃcintyatam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti, (PSP_6-8:132)
S06psp_6-8u:2906: yenātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ tam ātmabhāvaṃ sattvānām arthāya pratigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2907: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte 'sty etad arhataḥ pratyekabuddhasya vā upāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatas tiryagyonāv upapannaḥ syāt.
S06psp_6-8u:2909: bhagavān āha: tathāgatasya tad upāyakauśalyam asti yena tatropapannaḥ syād,
S06psp_6-8u:2910: ye ca tatra vadhāya parākramante tān anuttarāyāṃ kṣāntau samādāpayati vinaye pratiṣṭhāpayati teṣām eva cārthe ātmānaṃ parityajayati,
S06psp_6-8u:2911: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viheṭhanā bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2912: tad anena te suhbūte paryāyenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayamāṇo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tiryagyonau vartate.
S06psp_6-8u:2913: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2914: katameṣu bhagavan kuśaladharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam evaṃrūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_6-8u:2915: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2916: sarvan tat subhūte kuśalaṃ karma yad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2917_0: sarvakuśaladharmaparipūrir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_6-8u:2917_1: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇena na kaścid dharmo yo na paripūrayitavyo
S06psp_6-8u:2918: tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvakuśaladharmaparipūryai śikṣitavayaṃ yatra śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāsyati.
S06psp_6-8u:2919: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2920: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvac chukladharmasamanvāgata āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇāpāyeṣūpapadyate tiryagyonau vā?
S06psp_6-8u:2921: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte tathāgata āryo 'nāsravaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2923: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tiryagyonigataṃ prāṇinam ātmānam abhinirmiṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2925: subhūtir āha: kuryād bhagavan kuryāt sugata.
S06psp_6-8u:2926: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tiryag bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:2929: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tiryagyoner duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:2931: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2932: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāśraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvagataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2933: yenātmabhāvena samanvāgatam anyān paripācayed yathā tathāgataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2934: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatas tan nirmitam abhinirmiṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2937: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2938: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgatas tat tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:2941: subhūtir āha: na hi bhagavan duṣkhā apāyā?
S06psp_6-8u:2944: hastivigrahaṃ vāśvavigrahaṃ vā balīvardavigrahaṃ vānyān vā vividhān prāṇakajātān darśayaty api tu sa hastī vā bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:2945: aśvo vā balīvardavigraho vānye vā vividhāḥ prāṇakajātā bhavanti.
S06psp_6-8u:2947: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2948: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāveṇa samanvāgataḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2951_0: mahopāyakuśalo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo nāma bhagavann āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa
S06psp_6-8u:2951_1: samanvāgato yena yena hy ātmabhāvena śakyate sattvānām arthaḥ kartun taṃ tam evātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:2953: katameṣu bhagavan śukleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā idam evaṃrūpam upāyakauśalyaṃ karoti yena tair na lipyate?
S06psp_6-8u:2954: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte sthitvā bodhisattvo (PSP_6-8:134)
S06psp_6-8u:2956: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarasyām adhamūrdhaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:2957: na tatra kvacit spṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2958: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvathaiva dharmān nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:2959: yad vā spṛśyeta yena vā spṛśyeta yo vā spṛśyet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2960: tathā hi sarva ete trayo dharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ tatra na śūnyatayā śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate naiva śūnyatāṃ kaścit saṃspṛśati,
S06psp_6-8u:2961: nāpi śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2963: iyaṃ sānupalaṃbhaśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_6-8u:2964: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām eva sthito nānyeṣu dharmeṣu?
S06psp_6-8u:2965: bhagavān āha: katamo vā subhūte dharmoe yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāntargataḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2966: subhūtir āha: yad bhagavan prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_6-8u:2968: na hi bhagavañ chūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmāntargataḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2969: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:2970: na punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2973: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2974: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharme śūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:2975: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadī vālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:2976: teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2977: tān paryupāste dharmañ ca śṛṇoti teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavansu kuśalamūlāny avaropayaty,
S06psp_6-8u:2978: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhavaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:2979: teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:2980: tān paryupāste dharmañ ca śṛṇoti teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati.
S06psp_6-8u:2982: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2983: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tān sarvān śūnyān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2984: ye 'pi tatra buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ svabhāveṇa śūnyā,
S06psp_6-8u:2986: sā ca sarvā prajñaptiḥ svabhāvena śūnyā. yadi te lokadhātavo na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:2987: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:2988: te 'pi prajñaptisamudācārā na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:2989: tatprādeśikī śūnyatābhaviṣyad yasmāt prādeśikī śūnyatā nopalabhyate tasmāt sarvadharmā sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:2990: atra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:2991: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā divyañ cakṣur abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:2992: divyaṃ śrotram ṛddhividhijñānaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ cyutyupapattim abhinirharati. ābhir abhijñābhir bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:2993: yad iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhir antargatā,
S06psp_6-8u:2994: abhijñāsu bodhir antargatā mārgayitavyāyāṃ mārgayamāṇo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇātmanas tān kuśalān dharmān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:2996: na ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣv abhinivekṣyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:2997: tathā hi te sarvakuśalā dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:2998: na ca śūnyatā kvacid abhinivekṣyate yad abhiniveśam āsvādayiṣyati niḥsvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:2999: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati yena cakṣuṣā sarvadharmā śūnyān paśyati,

S06psp_6-8u:3004_1: diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyāṃ diśy uttarasyāṃ diśy adha ūrdhvalokadhātuṣu yāvad
S06psp_6-8u:3005: sa tatrarddhyā gatvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,

S06psp_6-8u:3008: dadata dānan duṣkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dāridryan na ca dāridryeṇa śakyam ātmano 'rthaḥ kartuṃ prāg eva parasya,
S06psp_6-8u:3009: tasmād yūyam ātmanā ca sukhino bhaviṣyatha parāṃś ca sukhayiṣyatha mā dāridryeṇānyeṣāṃ māṃsāni khādayanto na mokṣyatha tribhir apāyaiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3010: ye duḥśīlā sattvās teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3011: duḥkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ na ca dauḥśīlyena śakyam ātmano 'thaḥ kartuṃ prāg eva parasya,
S06psp_6-8u:3012: dauḥśīlyasya ca yo vipāko narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tatra yūyaṃ triṣv apāyeṣu prapatitā ātmānam eva na śakyathoddhartuṃ prāg eva paraṃ,

S06psp_6-8u:3017: tad bhavanto 'nyonyam evaṃ kṣubdhacittā vyāpannacittāḥ sthānam etad vidyate yan narakaṃ vā prapatathā tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā,

S06psp_6-8u:3038: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nāgamyābhijñā na śaknoti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayituṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3039: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3040_0: sa imābhir abhijñābhir abhinirhṛtābhir yad ākāṅkṣati sattvānām arthaṃ kartuṃ tat

S06psp_6-8u:3040_2: drakṣyati tatra sattvā utpannās tān drakṣyati,

S06psp_6-8u:3054_1: tatra ye sattvāḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyadhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti tebhyas tathāiva dharmaṃ

S06psp_6-8u:3062: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ.

S06psp_6-8u:3067: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratābhijñābhir vikrīḍitavyam evaṃ vikrīḍaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyati sattvān paripācayiṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:3068: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu paripāciteṣu sattveṣu śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06psp_6-8u:3071: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3072: katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhyaṅgāni yāni bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?

S06psp_6-8u:3077: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3078: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte dānapāramitā kuśalo dharmas tatra ca yāvikalpanā yad dānaṃ na jānātīdaṃ dānaṃ yasyārthe dātavyaṃ yena dātavyaṃ,

S06psp_6-8u:3083: yat prajñāṃ na jānātīyaṃ prajñā yasyārthe bhāvayitavyā yena bhāvayitavyā,

S06psp_6-8u:3090: yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti ca tariṣyanti ca,

S06psp_6-8u:3093: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavann ime dharmā bodhisattvadharmāḥ,

S06psp_6-8u:3140: yenārthena kṛtena na punar vipraṇasyanti yena vipraṇāśeṇa pañcagatike saṃsāre prapateyuḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3141: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3142: kiṃ punar bhagavatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāra upalabdhaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3144: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavatā kṛṣṇāṃ vā śuklaṃ vā karmopalabdham?
S06psp_6-8u:3146: subhūtir āha: yadi nopalabdhaṃ kuto narakas tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ prajñapto devamanuṣyāḥ prajñaptāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3149: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti?
S06psp_6-8u:3151: bhagavān āha: yadi subhūte sattvā evaṃ jānīyuḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3152: na bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhetānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthitvā na sattvān mocayet,
S06psp_6-8u:3155: sattvā na jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmāṃs te 'jñatā na parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt,
S06psp_6-8u:3156: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike śrutvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhet,
S06psp_6-8u:3157_0: ime dharmās tathā na saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭhās te sattvā asato
S06psp_6-8u:3157_1: 'saṃvidyamānāṃ dharmān svayam eva vikalpayanty upalabhante vāsattve sattvasaṃjñino
S06psp_6-8u:3160: asaṃvidyamānānāṃ viparyāse 'viparyastacittāḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca karmābhisaṃskurvanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3162: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpārmitāyāṃ caran sarvān antargatān kuśalān dharmān kṛtvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ carati,
S06psp_6-8u:3163: yayā caryayā carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3165_0: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya duṣkhañ ca duṣkhasamudayaṃ ca duṣkhanirodhañ
S06psp_6-8u:3165_1: ca duḥkhanirodhagāminīñ ca pratipadam ākhyāti deśayati prakāśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati
S06psp_6-8u:3166: eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣu sarvāntargatāḥ kuśalā dharmā ye kecid bodhipakṣyā dharmā yair bodhipākṣikair dharmais trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3169: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvāt sattvāḥ parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt.
S06psp_6-8u:3170: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃ punar bhagavan duḥkhajñānena parinirvānti,
S06psp_6-8u:3172: utāho samudayajñānena parinirvānti, atha samudayena parinirvānti?
S06psp_6-8u:3175: utāho mārgajñānena parinirvānti, atha mārgeṇa parinirvānti?
S06psp_6-8u:3176: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3177: na subhūte duṣkhajñānena parinirvānti na duṣkhena,
S06psp_6-8u:3181: yā punaḥ subhūte caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā tat parinirvāṇam uktaṃ mayā,
S06psp_6-8u:3182: na punar duḥkhena parinirvānti na duṣkhajñānena,
S06psp_6-8u:3186: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: katamā bhagavan caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā?
S06psp_6-8u:3187: bhagavān āha: yatra subhūte na duṣkhan na duṣkhajñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3191_0: api tu khalu subhūte yā eṣāṃ caturṇām āryasatyāṇāṃ tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā dharmatā
S06psp_6-8u:3191_1: dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā yasyotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād
S06psp_6-8u:3191_2: vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmādhātur yāsaṃpramoṣadharmatāyai
S06psp_6-8u:3192: tāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati,
S06psp_6-8u:3195: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3196: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati,
S06psp_6-8u:3199: yathā pratipadyamāno na śrāvakabhūmiṃ patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ patati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:3200: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: na so dharmo yasyāntaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3201: tathā ca paśyati yathā na kañcid dharmam upalabhate,

S06psp_6-8u:3205: sa evaṃ paśyann avakrāntaniyāmo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gotrabhūmau sthito bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3206: tasya gotrabhūmau sthitasya na mūrdhavinipāto bhavati yena mūrdhavinipātena śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patet,

S06psp_6-8u:3209: sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā sarvadharmān pravicinoti,
