S06psp_6-8u:3212: samudayañ ca prajahāti na ca samudayārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3213: nirodhañ ca sākṣātkaroti na ca nirodhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3214: mārgañ ca bhāvayati na ca mārgārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3215: anyatra bodhinimnena cittena bodhipraveśena bodhiprāgbhāreṇa cittena sarvadharmān yathāvat paśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:3216: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmān yathāvat paśyati?
S06psp_6-8u:3218: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmān śūnyān paśyati?
S06psp_6-8u:3219: bhagavān āha: yad uta svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3220: yo 'nayaivaṃrūpayā vipaśyanayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3221: na ca kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3223: subhūtir āha: evaṃ sati bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvā bodhiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3224: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etad,
S06psp_6-8u:3227: sā na buddhena kṛtā na pratyekabuddhena nārhatā nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ya iha samādhau caranty anyatra sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3228: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:3230: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3231: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tadā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ (PSP_6-8:146)
S06psp_6-8u:3233: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:3234: cakṣurāyatane śrotrāyatane ghrāṇāyatane jihvāyatane kāyāyatane manaāyatane kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:3235: rūpāyatane śabdāyatane gandhāyatane rasāyatane spraṣṭavyāyatane dharmāyatane kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:3243: avidyāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne nāmarūpe ṣaḍāyatane sparśe vedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇāyām upādāne bhave jātau jarāmaraṇe kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:3244: duṣkhasatye samudayasatye nirodhasatye mārgasatye kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:3245_0: rūpiṣu dharmeṣv arūpiṣu sanidarśaneṣv anidarśaneṣu sapratigheṣv apratigheṣu saṃskṛteṣv
S06psp_6-8u:3245_1: asaṃskṛteṣu sāsraveṣv anāsraveṣu sāvadyeṣv anavadyeṣu hīneṣu praṇīteṣv adhyātmikeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:3245_2: vā bāhyeṣu vā dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣv atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu kuśalākuśalavyākṛtāvyākṛteṣu
S06psp_6-8u:3246: rāge pratighe māne 'vidyāyāṃ dṛṣṭau vicikitsāyāṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:3247: mātsarye dāne dauḥśīlye śīle vyāpāde kṣāntau kauśīdye vīrye vikṣepe dhyāne dauṣprajñe prajñāyāṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:3248: vikalpe śūnyatāyāṃ nimitte ānimitte mithyāpraṇihite samyakpraṇihite,
S06psp_6-8u:3250: kleśe kleśaprahāṇe saṃkleśe vyavadāne saṃsāre nirvāṇe dhātau kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:3252: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evam āha:
S06psp_6-8u:3253: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā maitreya bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena,
S06psp_6-8u:3255: nāmamātraṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmamātraṃ yāvad (PSP_6-8:147)
S06psp_6-8u:3257: atha maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3258: yadā bhagavan savastukam idaṃ nāmadheyam upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3260: savastukam idaṃ nāmadheyam upalabhyate yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3261: savastukam idaṃ nāmadheyam upalabhyate yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3263: tadā kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmamātrakaṃ rūpam iti śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3264: nāmamātraṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmamātraṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_6-8u:3265: athāvastukam evaṃ sati tasya nāmnas tad api nāmamātraṃ na prayujyate yad idaṃ rūpam iti nāmamātraṃ na prayujyate yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3266: yāvad buddhadharmā iti nāmamātraṃ na prayujyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3267: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3268: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3269: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam,
S06psp_6-8u:3270: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad budhadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3271: yataś ca maitreya tena saṃskāranimittena vastūni rūpam ity etasmin nāmni rūpam iti saṃpratyayo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3274: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3275: yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti, tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3276: maitreya syād ihaikatyasya tasminn eva saṃskāranimitte vastūni saṃjñā vā prajñaptir vā nāma vānuvyavahāro vābhiniveśo vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3278: [bhagavān āha:] tad anenāpi te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3279: āgantukam ekam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3280: yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
S06psp_6-8u:3281: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat: (PSP_6-8:148)
S06psp_6-8u:3282: evaṃ sati bhagavann upalabdha eva bhavati rūpasya svabhāvo yat tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu,
S06psp_6-8u:3283: yad upādāya nāma saṃjñā prajñaptir anuvyavahāro bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3284: yad idaṃ rūpam iti yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
S06psp_6-8u:3285: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evam āha:
S06psp_6-8u:3286: saṃskāranimitte vastūni nāma saṃjñā prajñaptir anuvyavahāro rūpam iti, tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3287: maitreya svabhāvo vā sa rūpasya prajñaptimātraṃ veti.
S06psp_6-8u:3288: [maitreya] āha: prajñaptimātraṃ bhagavan yad idaṃ prajñaptimātram.
S06psp_6-8u:3289: bhagavān āha: tat kathaṃ maitreya tavaivaṃ bhavaty upalabdha evaṃ bhavati rūpasya svabhāva iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3290: yat tat saṃskāranimittavastu yad upādāya nāma saṃjñā prajñaptir anuvyavahāro bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3292: yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3293: maitreya svabhāvo vā sa vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñaptimātraṃ veti.
S06psp_6-8u:3294: [maitreya] āha: prajñaptimātraṃ bhagavan yad idaṃ prajñaptimātram.
S06psp_6-8u:3296: tat kathaṃ maitreya tavaivaṃ bhavaty upalabdha evaṃ bhavati vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāva iti?
S06psp_6-8u:3298: saced bhagavan nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāramātratvaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3299: tad evaṃ sati na tūpalabdha eva svabhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3301: tad evaṃ sati na tūpalabdha eva svabhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3302: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3307: iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3308: nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāramātratvam api nu tasyotpādo vā prajñāyate vyayo vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3311: ] tat kutas tavaivaṃ bhavati maitreya upalabdha eva svabhāvo bhavati rūpasya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇām iti peyālam?
S06psp_6-8u:3312: maitreya āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena nāsty eva rūpaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3313: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena nāsty eva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3315: bhagavān āha: nāhaṃ maitreya sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena rūpan nāstīti vadāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:3316: nāhaṃ maitreya sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā na santīti vadāmi.
S06psp_6-8u:3317: maitreya āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpam asti?
S06psp_6-8u:3318: kathaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmāḥ santi?
S06psp_6-8u:3320: lokasaṃketavyavahārato maitreya rūpam asti na tu paramārthato lokasaṃketavyavahārato maitreya vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmāḥ santi no paramārthataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3322: yathā khalv ahaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi nirabhilapya eva dhātuḥ paramārthataḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3324: tat kathaṃ yat tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu yatra rūpam ity āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3325: tat kathaṃ yat tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu yatra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā ity āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipyate paramārthato na bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3326: sacet tan na paramārthaḥ tat kathaṃ nirabhilapyo dhātur bhavati saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu nirabhilapyo dhātur iti na yujyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3328: tena hi maitreya tvām evātra pratipakṣāmi yathā te kṣamate tathāivaṃ vyākuru. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3329: maitreya yathā te nirabhilapya dhātau prajñāpracāro bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3330: upalabhase tvaṃ tasmin samaye saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu yatredam āgantukanāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad (PSP_6-8:150)
S06psp_6-8u:3331: idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskarā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
S06psp_6-8u:3333: [bhagavān āha:] tad anenāpi te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3334: yat tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastus tan nirabhilapyād dhātor nānyan nāpy ananyan,
S06psp_6-8u:3335: sa ca tasmāt saṃskāranimittād vastuno nānyo nirabhilapyo dhātur nāpy ananyo yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipataṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3336: vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3337: saṃskāranimittāc ced vastuno maitreya nirabhilapyo dhātur anyaḥ syād apīdānīṃ sarvakālaṃ pṛthagjanāḥ parinirvāyur anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddheran,
S06psp_6-8u:3338: ananyaś cen maitreya saṃskāranimittād vastuno nirabhilapyo dhātuḥ syād apīdānīṃ tad api nimittaṃ nopalabhyet,
S06psp_6-8u:3339: yatas tasya nirabhilapyasya dhātoḥ prativedho bhavet. tad anenāpi te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3340: na tasmāt saṃskāranimittād vastuno 'nyo nirabhilapyo dhātur,
S06psp_6-8u:3341: nāpi tasmād ananyo nirabhilapyo dhātur yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipataṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
S06psp_6-8u:3343: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirabhilapyadhātūpanibaddhe prajñāpracāre vartamānas tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:3344: yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3346: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evam āha:
S06psp_6-8u:3347: na hi maitreya tasya saṃskāranimittasya vastunaḥ kācid vidyamānatā vāvidyamānatā vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3348: yasmin hi vā maitreya samaye tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu vikalpayasi tasmin samaye tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu vikalpato grahaṇam eti,
S06psp_6-8u:3349: tasmin vā punaḥ samaye nirabhilapyadhātūpanibaddhe prajñāpracāre vartamāno na vikalpayasi tasmin samaye nirvikalpato grahaṇam eti.
S06psp_6-8u:3352: na tv evaṃ sati maitreya vikalpamātram etad yad uta saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ (PSP_6-8:151)
S06psp_6-8u:3353: yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskarā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3354: vikalpamātre vā punas tasya nirvikalpe vā dhātau vartamānasya vikalpeṣv apagateṣu katamā tasya vidyamānatā vāvidyamānatā vopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3355: yatredam āgantukaṃ nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti?
S06psp_6-8u:3357: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmaprabhedakauśalye vartamānena katibhir ākārai rūpaprabhedaprajñaptir anugantavyā?
S06psp_6-8u:3358: katibhir ākārair vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmaprabhedaprajñaptir anugantavyā?
S06psp_6-8u:3360: tribhir maitreyākārair bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmaprabhedakauśalye vartamānena rūpaprabhedaprajñaptir anugantavyā,
S06psp_6-8u:3361: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad budhdhadharmaprabhedaprajñaptir anugantavyā,
S06psp_6-8u:3362: yad utedaṃ parikalpitaṃ rūpam idaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpam idaṃ dharmatā rūpam iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3363: yad uteyaṃ parikalpitā vedanā iyaṃ vikalpitā vedanā iyaṃ dharmatā vedanā,
S06psp_6-8u:3364: yad uta iyaṃ parikalpitā saṃjñā iyaṃ vikalpitā saṃjñā iyaṃ dharmatā saṃjñā,
S06psp_6-8u:3365: yad uteme parikalpitāḥ saṃskārā ime vikalpitāḥ saṃskārā ime dharmatā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3366: idaṃ parikalpitaṃ vijñānam idaṃ vikalpitaṃ vijñānam idaṃ dharmatā vijñānam,
S06psp_6-8u:3367: ime yāvat parikalpitā buddhadharmā ime vikalpitā buddhadharmā ime dharmatā buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3368: maitreya āha: katamad bhagavan parikalpitaṃ rūpam?
S06psp_6-8u:3371: katamā bhagavan parikalpitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ?
S06psp_6-8u:3372: katamā vikalpaitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ?
S06psp_6-8u:3373: katamā dharmatā vedanā saṃjjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ?
S06psp_6-8u:3378: yā maitreya tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni rūpam iti nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāran niśritya rūpasvabhāvatayā parikalpatenedaṃ parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3380_0: vastūni vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskāra iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāran
S06psp_6-8u:3381: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ime parikalpitā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3382: yā punas tasya saṃskāranimittasya vastuno vikalpamātradharmatāyām avasthānatā vikalpapratītyābhilapanatā tatredaṃ nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāro rūpam iti,
S06psp_6-8u:3385_0: idaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vikalpitā vedanā iyaṃ vikalpitā saṃjñā ime vikalpitāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:3385_1: saṃskārā idaṃ vikalpitaṃ vijñānam ime vikalpitā buddhadharmāḥ. yā utpādād vā tathāgatānām
S06psp_6-8u:3385_2: anutpādād vā sthitaiveyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmadhātur yat tena
S06psp_6-8u:3385_3: parikalpitarūpeṇa tasya vikalpitarūpasya nityaṃ nityakālaṃ dhruvaṃ dhruvakālaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā
S06psp_6-8u:3385_4: dharmanairātmyaṃ tathatā bhūtakoṭir idaṃ dharmatā rūpam iyaṃ dharmatā vedanā saṃjñā
S06psp_6-8u:3386: maitreya āha: eṣāṃ bhagavan trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ katamad rūpam adravyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ?
S06psp_6-8u:3388: kataman naivādravyaṃ na sadravyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ paramārthaprabhāvitaṃ?
S06psp_6-8u:3389: āsāṃ bhagavaṃs tiṣṛṇāṃ vedanānāṃ tiṣṛṇāṃ saṃjñānāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ katame 'dravyā draṣṭavyā?
S06psp_6-8u:3391: katame naivādravyā draṣṭavyā na sadravyān paramārthaprabhāvitāḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3392: bhagavān āha: yat maitreya parikalpitaṃ rūpam idam adravyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3393: yad vikalpitaṃ rūpam idaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ sadravyatām upādāya sadravyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ no tu svatantravṛttitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3394: yad dharmatā rūpaṃ tan naivādravyaṃ sadravyaṃ paramārthaprabhāvitaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ, (PSP_6-8:153)
S06psp_6-8u:3395: yā maitreya parikalpitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ye parikalpitā buddhadharmā ime 'dravyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3396: yā vikalpitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ye vikalpitā buddhadharmā ime vikalpitasadravyatām upādāya sadravyā draṣṭavyā no tu svatantravṛttitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3397: yā maitreya dharmatā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ye maitreya dharmatā buddhadharmās te naivādravyā na sadravyāḥ paramārthena prabhāvitā draṣṭavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3398: maitreya āha: yad uktaṃ bhagavan bhagavatādvayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta rūpam ity,
S06psp_6-8u:3399: advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti tad evaṃ rūpaprabhedaprajñaptau satyām,
S06psp_6-8u:3400: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmaprabhedaprajñaptau satyāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3401_0: kiṃ saṃdhāya nirdiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā
S06psp_6-8u:3401_1: gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:3402: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? maitreya yā parikalpite rūpe 'dravyatā rūpaṃ vā tan na veti.
S06psp_6-8u:3404: [bhagavān āha:] yā punas tatra nāmasaṃjñāprajñaptivyavahāramātratā rūpam ity api nu tad rūpam?
S06psp_6-8u:3406: [bhagavān āha:] tad anena maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3407: yat parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ tan na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ yat punā rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3408: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3409: maitreya yā vikalpitasya rūpasya sadravyatā api nu tad rūpaṃ yad upādāya nāmasaṃjñāprajñaptivyavahāro bhavati rūpam iti.
S06psp_6-8u:3412: maitreya yā nimittena parikalpitena rūpeṇa parikalpitasya rūpasya tat svabhāvatāsallakṣaṇatāpi nu tad (PSP_6-8:154) rūpam.
S06psp_6-8u:3414: [bhagavān āha:] tad anena te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3415: yad vikalpitaṃ rūpam api na rūpan nārūpaṃ yat punar na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayam,
S06psp_6-8u:3416: idañ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3417: maitreya yā dharmatā rūpasya nairātmyaprabhāvitatāpi nu tad rūpam.
S06psp_6-8u:3419: [bhagavān āha:] yā punas tathāivaṃ dharmatā rūpasya rūpadharmatā api nu tad rūpam?
S06psp_6-8u:3421: [bhagavān āha:] tad anena maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3422_0: yad dharmatā rūpam api na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ yan na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayam idaṃ ca
S06psp_6-8u:3422_1: saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayādvayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu
S06psp_6-8u:3424_0: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpa evam advayalakṣaṇakuśalasya
S06psp_6-8u:3424_1: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne yāvad buddhadharmeṣu evam advayalakṣaṇakuśalasyāntadvayaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3430: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ maitreya carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntadvayaṃ varjayitvā madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipannasya,
S06psp_6-8u:3431: rūpasya yan na parijñānaṃ nāparijñānam iyam evāsya parijñā,
S06psp_6-8u:3432: yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na parijñānaṃ nāparijñānam iyam evāsya parijñā,
S06psp_6-8u:3434: na prahāṇaṃ nāprahāṇam idam evāsya prahāṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3435: yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na prahāṇaṃ nāprahāṇam idam evāsya prahāṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3436: yā rūpasya na sākṣātkriyā nāsākṣātkriyā iyam evāsya sākṣātkriyā,
S06psp_6-8u:3437_0: yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na sākṣātkriyā
S06psp_6-8u:3437_1: nāsākṣātkriyā iyam evāsya sākṣātkriyā rūpaprahāṇāya na mārgasya bhāvanā nābhāvanā
S06psp_6-8u:3438: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya na mārgasya bhāvanā nābhāvanā iyam evāsya bhāvanā.
S06psp_6-8u:3440: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃś carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ parijñāprahāṇasākṣātkriyābhāvanāsamanvāgatasya katamaṃ nirvāṇam?
S06psp_6-8u:3441: bhagavān āha: gambhīraṃ maitreya paramagambhīraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirvāṇam.
S06psp_6-8u:3442: maitreya āha: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ gambhīraṃ paramagambhīraṃ nirvāṇam?
S06psp_6-8u:3444: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ maitreya nirvāṇaṃ yan nirvāṇaṃ nānirvāṇaṃ tena gambhīraṃ paramagambhīram ity ucyate.
S06psp_6-8u:3445: maitreya āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ na nirvāṇaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3446: bhagavān āha: parārthaṃ maitreyārabhya saṃsārāparityāgo na nirvāṇam,
S06psp_6-8u:3449: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parārtham ārabhya saṃsāraṃ na parityajati saṃsārāt parityāgāt katham anena nirvāṇaṃ na parityaktaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3450: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmārtham ārabhya nirvāṇaṃ na parityajati nirvāṇāparityāgāt katham anena saṃsāro na parityakto bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3452: iha maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran saṃsāram api saṃsārato na vikalpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3455: yad uta saṃsāraś ca nirvāṇaś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3456: tathā hi sa yathā saṃsāraṃ saṃsārato 'vikalpayan saṃsārān nodvijati,
S06psp_6-8u:3457: tathāiva nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇato 'vikalpayan nirvāṇato nodvijaty evam avikalpadhātupratiṣṭhitasyānayā yuktyā na saṃsāraparityāgo na nirvāṇaparityāgo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3459: na nu bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāvikalpadhātupratiṣṭhitena saṃsāro yathaiva na tyaktas tathā nādattaḥ katham atyakto bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3460: nirvāṇaṃ yathā na tyaktaṃ tathā nādattaṃ kathaṃ atyaktaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3461: bhagavān āha: nāhaṃ maitreya saṃsārasyaivam ādānaṃ vānādānaṃ vā vadāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:3462_0: nirvāṇasyaivam ādānaṃ vānādānaṃ vā vadāmy api tu maitreya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato
S06psp_6-8u:3462_3: upādāyāhaṃ parinirvṛtāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃsārasyāparityāgaṃ vadāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:3464: maitreya āha: avikalpanāyā bhagavan kathaṃ samastalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:3466_0: yac ca maitreya rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ yāvad
S06psp_6-8u:3466_1: ye ca buddhadharmā yā ca rūpasya śūnyatā yā ca vedanāyā yā ca saṃjñāyā yā ca saṃskārāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3466_2: yā ca vijñānasya yā ca yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:3467: teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ tasyāś ca śūnyatāyā yā bhāvābhāvādvayatā yā cāprapañcanā idaṃ maitreya avikalpanāyāḥ samastalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:3468: maitreya āha: kiṃ nu bhagavan sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇām ekāṃśenaikāṃśikī nirvāṇapratiṣṭhā bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3469: bhagavān āha: no hīdaṃ maitreya, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3470: hi nānādhātuko 'yaṃ maitreya loko 'nekadhātukas tasmiṃś ca nānādhātukeṣu bhūtāḥ sattvagotraprabhṛtaya upalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:3472: yādita eva praṇītaṃ viśesaṃ prārthayate praṇītam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:3473: asti sā gotrajātir yādita evaṃ hīṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate hīnam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati tenaiva ca saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3474: asti sā gotrajātir yādita eva hīnaviśeṣaṃ prārthayate hīnam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati na ca tāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:3475: tata uttari praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate praṇītam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati.
S06psp_6-8u:3476: maitreya āha: yo bhagavaṃs tṛtīyaḥ sattvo gotrabhūmiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3477: so 'rhattvaṃ prāpyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhiprārthayamāno 'nupapadyamānaś ca kathaṃ prāpnoty upapattiś cāsya bhagavatā pratipattau ca na vyākṛtā?
S06psp_6-8u:3478: bhagavān āha: no 'haṃ maitreya karmakleśavaśena tasyopapattiṃ prajñāpayāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:3479: api tv acintyān nirvāṇapāragāminīm arhato 'py upapattiṃ prajñāpayāmi.
S06psp_6-8u:3480: maitreya āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad udārāśayā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā māhātmyādhyāśayāś ca,
S06psp_6-8u:3481: yatredānīm ādita eva praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3486: yan maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakratvalokapālatvacakravartitvasarvākāralokasaṃpattibhir anarthino 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3487_0: tāsu ca niḥsaṃgatā niravagrahatā ceyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām udārāśayatā.
S06psp_6-8u:3487_1: tat punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tad asaktisukham anavagrahasukhaṃ nirvṛttisukhaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3487_2: ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇam icchanto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3488: yad uta saṃsārāparityāgatayā iyam eṣāṃ māhātmyādhyāśayatā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_6-8u:3489: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3492: āścaryān adbhutān bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvadharmān anuprāptukāmenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:3494: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3495_0: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās te na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair
S06psp_6-8u:3495_1: nārhadbhir nānāgāmibhir na sakṛdāgāmibhir na srotaāpannair nāpi tair bodhisattvair
S06psp_6-8u:3495_2: mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtās tat kuta eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā vyavasthānaṃ vā prajñāyate?
S06psp_6-8u:3496: ime nairayikā ime tairyagyonikā ime yāmalaukikā ime devā ime mānuṣyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3497: anena karmaṇā nairayikā anena karmaṇā tiryagyonikā anena karmaṇā yāmalaukikā anena karmaṇā manuṣyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3503: anena karmaṇā aspṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3504: anena karmaṇā ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattayo vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattaya ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattayo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3505: anena karmaṇā srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho,
S06psp_6-8u:3507: 'nena karmaṇā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'bhāvasya hi bhagavan na kācit kriyā yayā narakaṃ vā gacchacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3508: tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā kāmadhātuṃ vā rūpadhātuṃ vā ārūpyadhātuṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3509: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā prāpsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3513: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etad yathā vadasi,
S06psp_6-8u:3514: abhāvasya hi subhūte na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3515: bālapṛthagjanā hi subhūte yāvad āryadharmeṣv akovidās te abhāvasvabhāvān dharmān na jānanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3516: te viparyāsasamutthitair vikalpair vividhāni karmāṇy upasthāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3518: yadi vā nairayikā yadi vā tairyagyonikā yadi vā yāmalaukikā yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā kāmadhātuṣu deveṣu yadi vā rūpadhātukeṣu (PSP_6-8:159)
S06psp_6-8u:3519: deveṣu yadi vā ārūpyadhātukeṣu deveṣu yāvad abhāvasya na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3520: yaḥ punar abhāvo 'bhāva eva saḥ. yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha:
S06psp_6-8u:3521: yaḥ srotāapannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārgajñatāyāṃ carati tathāgato vā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3522: subhūte nābhāvo mārgo nābhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalan nābhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalan nābhāvo 'nāgāmiphalan nābhāvo 'rhattvan nābhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir nābhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_6-8u:3524: abhāvo bhagavan mārgo 'bhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam abhāvo nāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'rhattvam abhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir abhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_6-8u:3525: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte 'bhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_6-8u:3528_0: iti hi subhūte yaś cābhāvo yaś ca mārgaḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā
S06psp_6-8u:3528_1: arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:3528_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena ye sattvāś caturbhir viparyāsair abhiniviṣṭāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:3528_3: pañcasu skandheṣv anitye nityasaṃjñino 'nātmany ātmasaṃjñino duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñino
S06psp_6-8u:3528_4: 'śubhe śubhasaṃjñmo bhāveṣv abhiniviṣṭās tāṃs tān bhāvebhyo vivecayati.
S06psp_6-8u:3530: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3531_0: asti bhagavan avastu bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ tathatāvitathatā yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā
S06psp_6-8u:3531_1: idaṃ vastv ity abhiniveśenābhiniviśya bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ tathatāvitathatā karmābhisaṃkurvanti
S06psp_6-8u:3531_2: yena karmaṇā pañcagatikān saṃsārān na parimucyante.
S06psp_6-8u:3533: nāsti subhūte 'ntaśo vālāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātram api vastu yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanāḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti,
S06psp_6-8u:3535: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan viparyāsena bālapṛthagjanāḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti?
S06psp_6-8u:3537: bhagavān aha: tena hi subhūte upamān te kariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:3538: asyaivārthasya bhūyasyā mātrayā prasiddhaye yathā paṇḍitā jānīyus, tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_6-8u:3539: subhūte kiñcit svapne darśinas tad vastv asti yatra sthitvā svapnadarśī pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricaret.
S06psp_6-8u:3541: svapna eva tāvad bhagavan nāsti kutaḥ punas tatra sthitvā svapnadarśī pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricariṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:3543: subhūte 'sti sa kaścid dharmo laukiko vā lokottaro vā sāsravo vānāsravo vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā yo na svapnopamaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3545: nāsti bhagavan sa kaścid dharmaḥ saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā sāsravo vānāsravo vā laukiko vā lokottaro vā yo na svapnopamaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3546: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte kaścit svapne pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro vidyate?
S06psp_6-8u:3550: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta vā na vyavadāyeta vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3552: no hīdaṃ bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan svapno 'prajñaptiko 'prajñapanīyaḥ sarvapadavyañjanaiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3554: subhūte yadādarśamaṇḍale pratibimbo dṛśyate kiñcit tasya vastv asti yat karmābhisaṃskuryād yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet?
S06psp_6-8u:3556: no hīdaṃ bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan pratibimbo 'nyatra bālapṛthagjanānām ullāpanāt tat kutas tasya karma bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3557: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet.
S06psp_6-8u:3559: subhūte kācit tasya mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3560: subhūtir āha: no bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan pratibimbakas (PSP_6-8:161)
S06psp_6-8u:3561: tat kutas tasya mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3563_1: niścarati kin tasyāḥ pratiśrutkāyāḥ karmāsti yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet
S06psp_6-8u:3564: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet?
S06psp_6-8u:3565: subhūtir āha: no bhagavan na vastukā sā pratiśrutkā kutas tasyāḥ karma bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:3566: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3567: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet.
S06psp_6-8u:3569: subhūte kin tasyāḥ pratiśrutkā yā mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāpayeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3571: no bhagavann atyantatayā sā bhagavan pratiśrutkā nāsti kutas tasyā mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyet, na vyavadāyet.
S06psp_6-8u:3573_0: subhūte yā sā marīcyām anudake udakasaṃjñā anadīṣu vā nadīsaṃjñā anagareṣu nagarasaṃjñā
S06psp_6-8u:3573_1: anudyāneṣv udyānasaṃjñā kiṃ tasyā marīcisaṃjñāyāḥ karmāsti yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya
S06psp_6-8u:3573_2: narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3574: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet?
S06psp_6-8u:3576_0: no bhagavann atyantatayā bhagavaṃs tasyāṃ marīcyām udakaṃ nāsti naiva nadī naiva
S06psp_6-8u:3576_1: nagaran naivodyānam anyatra saṃjñāviparyāsaś cakṣurmohanatāyās tat kuto 'syāḥ karma
S06psp_6-8u:3576_2: bhaviṣyati yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3577: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣu gacchet.
S06psp_6-8u:3579: subhūte kiṃ tasyāṃ viparyastāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na (PSP_6-8:162)
S06psp_6-8u:3582: no bhagavan na hi viparyastāyāṃ bhagavan saṃjñāyām asti mārgabhāvanā yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3585_0: yadi vā hastikāyo yadi vāśvakāyo yadi vā balīvardakāyo yadi vā pattikāyo yadi vā
S06psp_6-8u:3585_1: janapadakāyo yadi vā strīrūpaṃ yadi vā puruṣarūpam api nu tasyā māyāyāḥ karmāsti
S06psp_6-8u:3585_2: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3586: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣūpapadyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3588_0: no bhagavan na hi māyāyā bhagavan vastv asty antaśo vālāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātram api
S06psp_6-8u:3588_1: yatra sthitvā karmābhisaṃkuryād yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3588_2: vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv
S06psp_6-8u:3590: subhūte kācit tasya mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3592: no bhagavan na vastu kasya bhagavan dharmasya kuto mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3594: subhūte yat punas tathāgatanirmito 'bhinirmiṇoty anyan nirmitaṃ kiṃ tasya nirmitasya karmāsti yena karmaṇā narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:3595: manuṣyeṣu vā kāmāvacareṣu vā deveṣu rūpāvacareṣu vā deveṣv ārūpyāvacareṣu vā deveṣūpapadyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3596: subhūtir āha: no bhagavan na vastukaḥ sa bhagavan nirmitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3598: subhūte kācit tasya nirmitasya mārgabhāvanā bhavati yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vayavadāyeta.
S06psp_6-8u:3601: bhagavan aha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte kaścid atra saṃkliśyeta vā vyavadāyeta vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3602: subhūtir āha: na kaścid bhagavan saṃkliśyeta vā vyavadāyeta vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3604: yathaiva subhūte na saṃkliśyeta vā na vyavadāyeta vā tathāiva nāsti saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3605: ahaṃkāramamakāre hi subhūte sthitāḥ sattvāḥ saṃkliśyante vā vyavadāyante vā,
S06psp_6-8u:3606: yathaiva bhūtadarśī na saṃkliśyate vā na vyavadāyate vā tathāiva subhūte nāsti saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:3608: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3609: bhūtaṃ veti bhagavan na saṃkliśyate na vayavadāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3610: abhūtaṃ veti bhagavan na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3612: abhāvasvabhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3613: bhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam,
S06psp_6-8u:3614: abhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3615: bhāvābhāvasyāpi bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ tatra yad etad bhagavatā vyavadānan nirdiṣṭan tat katham idaṃ bhagavan bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:3616: bhagavān āha: yā eṣā subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā tan mayoktaṃ vyavadānam.
S06psp_6-8u:3617: subhūtir āha: sā punaḥ katamā sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā?
S06psp_6-8u:3618: bhagavān āha: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:3619: yā utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmadhātum idam ucyate vyavadānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3620: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahriyate na punaḥ paramārthenānirabhilapyo hi so 'pravyāhāraḥ sarvākāraghoṣavākyathātītaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:3622: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3623_0: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ pratibimbopamā
S06psp_6-8u:3623_1: marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nirmitakopamās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:3624_0: sarvadharmaiḥ pratiśrutkopamaiḥ pratibhāsopamaiḥ pratibimbopamair marīcyupamair māyopamair
S06psp_6-8u:3624_1: gandharvanagaropamair nirmitakopamair dharmair avastukeṣv adravyeṣv anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3658: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni paripūrayaty aśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3659: yāvat trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātāv ābhāsakarīm ābhāṃ pariniṣpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3661: tatraikena svareṇa daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu yathādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ cetasaiva cittam ājñāya dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:3663: subhūte naite dharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ pratibimbopamā marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nirmitakopamāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3666: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ pratibimbopamā marīcyupamā māyopamā gandharvanagaropamā nirmitakopamāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3668: sarvadharmeṣu yāvan nirmitakopameṣu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_6-8u:3669_0: na ca bhagavan svapno bhūto na pratiśrutkā bhūtā na pratibhāso bhūto na pratibimbaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3669_1: bhūtaṃ na marīcir bhūtā na māyā bhūtā na gandharvanagaraṃ bhūtaṃ na nirmitako bhūto
S06psp_6-8u:3669_2: na ca bhagavan śakyam abhūtena dānapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3669_3: carituṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carituṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carituṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3672: śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,

S06psp_6-8u:3925: yaiḥ kuśalair mūlaiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetrañ ca parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:3926: bhagavān āha: yad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_6-8u:3929: saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:3931: ya ime bhagavan vilakṣaṇā dharmās te katham ekalakṣaṇā vilakṣaṇānāñ ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā katham ekalakṣaṇā yukteti.
S06psp_6-8u:3932: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yā rūpasya dharmatā, kiṃ (PSP_6-8:175)
S06psp_6-8u:3934: ya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:3957: yā tathāgatadharmatā, kiṃ na śūnyā sā.
S06psp_6-8u:3958: subhūtir āha: śūnyā sā bhagavan śūnyā sā sugata.
S06psp_6-8u:3961: rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:3965: laukikalokottarāṇāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3967: bālapṛthagjanānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3968: dharmānusāriṇāṃ vā lakṣaṇam aṣṭamakānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3969_0: srotaāpannānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ vā lakṣaṇam anāgāmināṃ vā lakṣaṇam arhatāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3969_1: vā lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3971: bhagavān āha: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:3972: yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra pṛthagjanā nānyatra pṛthagjanebhyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3984: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:3985: kiṃ punar bhagavan dharmatā saṃskṛtā utāho 'saṃskṛtā?
S06psp_6-8u:3986: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: na saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā,
S06psp_6-8u:3988: na cāsaṃskṛtavyatirekeṇa saṃskṛta upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:3989: tathā hi subhūte yaś ca saṃskṛto dhātur yaś cāsaṃskṛto dhātur dvāv apy etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇau yad utālakṣaṇau,
S06psp_6-8u:3990: tat punas tathāgato lokavyavahāreṇa vyavaharati na punaḥ paramārthena,
S06psp_6-8u:3991: na ca paramārthe kaścit kāyasaṃskāre na vāksaṃskāre na manaḥsaṃskāre nānyatra kāyasaṃskārān nānyatra vāksaṃskārān nānyatra manaḥsaṃskārāt paramārtha upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3992: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ samatā sa paramārthas tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paramārthataś ca na calati,
S06psp_6-8u:3995: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tan na kasyacid dharmasya kaścid dharmaḥ kiṃcit karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:3996_0: akiṃcitkareṣv akiṃcaneṣu niṣkiṃcaneṣu cādharmeṣu kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3996_1: caran paramārthataś ca na calati sattvānāṃ ca kṛtyaṃ karoti dānena vā priyavadyatayā
S06psp_6-8u:3997: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:3999: yac chūnyatā akiṃcanā niṣkiṃcanā na kasyacit kiṃcit karoti kṛtyaṃ vā akṛtyaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:4000: yadi subhūte ete sattvāḥ svayam eva śūnyatāṃ jānīyur neyaṃ tathāgatasya vṛṣabhitā bhavet,
S06psp_6-8u:4004_0: evaṃ sattvasaṃjñāyā vivecayati jīvasaṃjñāyā jantusaṃjñāyāḥ poṣasaṃjñāyāḥ puruṣasaṃjñāyāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:4004_1: pudgalasaṃjñāyā manujasaṃjñāyā mānavasaṃjñāyāḥ kārakasaṃjñāyā vedakasaṃjñāyā jānakasaṃjñāyāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:4023: śabdasaṃjñāyā gandhasaṃjñāyā rasasaṃjñāyāḥ sparśasaṃjñāyā dharmasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_6-8u:4037_1: vedanāsaṃjñāyās tṛṣṇāsaṃjñāyā upādānasaṃjñāyā bhavasaṃjñāyā jātisaṃjñāyā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_6-8u:4043: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kena bhagavan na saṃskṛto dhātuḥ śūnyaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4044: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:4046: api tu khalu subhūte yan nirmito 'nyan nirmitaṃ nirmiṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:4047: kaccit tasya tad vastv asti yan na śūnyatā?
S06psp_6-8u:4048: subhūtir āha: no bhagavan nirmitasya hi bhagavan na kaccid vastv (PSP_6-8:178)
S06psp_6-8u:4050: ya ca śūnyatā yaś ca nirmitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4052: na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau dvāv etau śūnyatayā śūnyau,
S06psp_6-8u:4053: tat kiṃ vinigūhitam iyaṃ śūnyatāyaṃ nirmitaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4054: tathā hi tāv ubhāv api śūnyatāyān nopalabhyate, iyaṃ śūnyatāyaṃ nirmitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4056: nāsti subhūte rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yaś ca nirmito yā ca śūnyatā ubhayam etac chūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:4057: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann ime laukikā dharmā nirmitā api nu ime lokottarā dharmā nirmitāḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4058: yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi,
S06psp_6-8u:4059: pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni,
S06psp_6-8u:4061_3: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahākaruṇā,
S06psp_6-8u:4062: yac ca teṣāṃ phalaṃ yena te pudgalāḥ prajñāpyante,
S06psp_6-8u:4063_0: śraddhānusārī dharmānusāry aṣṭamakaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho
S06psp_6-8u:4063_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi nu bhagavann ime dharmā nirmitāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4064: bhagavān āha: yatra punaḥ sarvadharmā nirmitās tatra kaścic chrāvakanirmitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4068: kaścit karmanirmito 'nena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā nirmitakopamā anānākaraṇāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4070: yat punar idaṃ bhagavan prahāṇaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā nirmitā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiprahāṇam api nirmitam?
S06psp_6-8u:4071: bhagavān āha: ye kecit subhūte dharmā utpāditā vā nirodhitā vā sarva ete nirmitāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4072: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavan dharmo yo na nirmitakaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:4073: bhagavān āha: yasya notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa dharmo na nimitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4075: subhūtir āha: sa punaḥ katamo bhagavan?
S06psp_6-8u:4077: subhūtir āha: yat punar bhagavatoktaṃ śūnyatāyāś ca na calati,
S06psp_6-8u:4079: na ca kaścid dharmo yo na śūnyas tasmād bhagavan saṃmoṣadharmo nirmitako bhavet.
S06psp_6-8u:4080: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:4081: sarvadharmāḥ subhūte svabhāvena śūnyās te na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā na bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtā na tathāgataiḥ kṛtā,
S06psp_6-8u:4083: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:4086: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:4087: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte pūrvaṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvo bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_6-8u:4088: nātra subhūte bhāvo nābhāvo na svabhāvo na parabhāvaḥ, kuta eva svabhāvaśūnyatā bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_6-8u:4091: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanaso maitreyapramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4092: āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtir āyuṣmāṃś ca śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś cānandaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4093: śakraś ca devānām indraḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti.
S06psp_6-8u:4094: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāni prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ dharmakāyādhikāraḥ śikṣāparivarto nāmāṣṭamaḥ samāpta iti
S06psp_6-8u:4095: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat,
S06psp_6-8u:4096: teṣāñ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:4097: oṃ gate 2 pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā.
